text:
This was one of my favourite hotels in Sri Lanka, it was tranquil and calming, the location was unbelievable. The design of the hotel was fantastic and the rooms everything you could imagine.

What made this hotel really special was the amazing food and that even more amazing staff, nothing was too much trouble, they were friendly, attentive and professional, they were an absolute pleasure. Nothing was too much trouble and they were full of smiles all of the time. It really made us feel welcome and valued and we had a lovely few days with them.

We were assigned a personal bus on arrival who not only looked after us at meal times and anything we needed but also looked after our room as well. He gave us a phone and we could phone him if we needed anything at all, he was one of the nicest men I’ve met and made recommendations for the food and gave us information about the place and the culture, I genuinely feel the staff here cared which is very rare in this day and age, well done to the management for stealing value into their people,
title: Amazing location, tranquil and relaxing hotel and about the nicest hotel staff I’ve ever met

text: Stayed at Crystal Sands over the weekend with my wife and my youngest kid. Everything felt luxurious and contemporary, starting from the check in experience itself. We stayed at the Sand Suites and we got a breathtaking view of the Indian Ocean. Above all, the hospitality was great. A special kudos to Dilki who was really helpful throughout. Definitely would return in the future
title: Wonderful and relaxing time at Crystal Sands

placeInfo/address: 503 Galle Road, Rathgama 80260 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Location on the beach with a hotel lifeguard but would need a Tuk Tuk to go to the town.
text: The experience we had at Crystal Sands was excellent. The accommodation was better than I expected and the staff couldn't do enough for you. The food was to a very high standard and then menu had a very good choice, breakfast was excellent and the omelettes amazing. I would recommend this hotel to my family and friends.
title: A great stay at the Crystal Sands

placeInfo/address: 503 Galle Road, Rathgama 80260 Sri Lanka
text: Our stay in crystal sands was amazing as always. The accommodation was comfortable and we had  a great view of the ocean. There was a lovely plunge pool in the balcony as well. The service provided, especially by restaurant staff Dilki and Rakitha was great and contributed to a smooth stay.
title: Crystal sands/A great getaway!

placeInfo/address: 503 Galle Road, Rathgama 80260 Sri Lanka
text: Шикарный отель! Номера с собственными бассейнами на балконах! Отдельно хочу отметить сотрудников отеля. Все всегда в хорошем расположении духа , особенно Dilki, каждый день поднимала нам настроение с самого утра! Спасибо за наш замечательный отдых!
title: Замечательный отдых в Crystal sands

placeInfo/address: 503 Galle Road, Rathgama 80260 Sri Lanka
text:
We recently stayed at Crystal Sands in Hikkaduwa, and it was absolutely incredible. The food was absolutely amazing, all thanks to Chef Krishantha and his amazing team. Kavindi and Dilki went above and beyond to make us feel welcome—they were so warm and professional. The entire staff was fantastic and clearly very well-trained.

The rooms were modern, beautifully designed, and way better than we expected. The location was stunning and felt really secure, which made it the perfect place to unwind. It was worth every cent, and we had such a great time.

Big thanks to the whole team—we can’t wait to come back on our next holiday!
title: "Unforgettable Stay at Crystal Sands – Can’t Wait to Return!"

placeInfo/address: 503 Galle Road, Rathgama 80260 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Book the ocean view villas. It is worth the extra pay.
text: Excellent place. The villa was very specious & had a touch of luxury. Breath taking ocean view with private jacuzzi type pool. Very clean beach. Food was excellent. Infinity pool on the roof top was once again great. Staff was very professional & very sincere. Specially restaurant staff Ms. Dilki. She was so kind enough to arrange a cake for our anniversary without requesting. Overall it was a great experience & a memorable one. Thank you for the great hospitality.
title: A great Experience.

placeInfo/address: 503 Galle Road, Rathgama 80260 Sri Lanka
text:
Начнем по порядку:
1 - очень стильный, современный отель с прекрасным видом на океан!
2 - номер:
Проживали в вилле с двумя отдельными спальнями со взрослой дочерью.
В каждой спальне свой санузел с душевой кабиной, есть шампунь и  кондиционер (хорошего качества), молочко для тела, гель для душа и жидкое мыло. Есть ватные диски, ватные палочки, шапочка для для душа.
Нет набора для чистки зубов!!!
Очень удобные подушки!!! Особенно вторая, которая менее наполненная.
Есть отдельный кондиционер в каждой спальне.
В санузле окошко, которое расположено достаточно высоко, что тебя не видно, но видно океан и окружающую природу, очень здорово, особенно утром.
Звукоизоляция просто великолепная!!!
Ни разу не слышали соседей и никто нам не стучал и не просил сделать телевизор потише, так как до 24-00 мы смотрели какое либо кино...
3 - кухня в номере: 
Отдельно хочется сказать про наполнение кухонной зоны: по приезду посуды в номере не много: бокалы и чашки для кофе/чая. Но по первой просьбе на ресепшн все принесли: и приборы, и тарелки, и кастрюли, и сковороду)
Есть индукционная плита, микроволновка, так же есть духовка. И стиральная машина!
Большой холодильник.
4 - плюшки:
Не нашла этой информации в отзывах, поэтому постараюсь все перечислить:
- капсулы для кофемашины (капсульная кофемашина есть),
- кофе молотый для заваривания в чайнике френч-пресс (чайник есть), 
- 4 вида чая (жасминовый зеленый, масала, зеленый и черный), которые насыпаны в специальные баночки  и стильный чайник,
- 2 коробочки с молоком по 180 гр в холодильнике,
- 2 бутылочки колы 0,3 л,
- 2 бутылочки спрайта 0,3 л,
- 1 бутылка минеральной воды 0,3 л,
- 1 бутылка тоника 0,3 л,
Пополняется ежедневно при уборке.
- фильтрованная вода в многоразовый бутылках, 4 шт по 0,5 л.
Но если надо больше, то по просьбе на ресепшн принесут!)
Так же есть много позиций мини бара, не пользовались)
4 - круглосуточный тренажерный зал:
не большой, но дорожка беговая есть, элипсоид, гантели, 2 лавки, универсальный тренажер, 4 коврика, полотенца, вода, кондиционер (2 шт).
5 - ресторан:
Сразу после заселения на вотсап прислали меню ресторан и напитки. Можно по цене ориентироваться.
НО!!!
в прайсе указано только 10% сервисного сбора, а на самом деле еще 2 каких то сбора есть! Поэтому к цене по прайсу надо прибавлять 35%, вот это будет итоговая цена!
Но это ни в коем случае не умаляет качество питания и обслуживания: коктейли просто великолепны, блюда раз на раз не попадешь, но не вкусно не было ни разу!
Подача, обслуживание, просто восторг!
Кстати, что мы не могли осилить, нам упаковывали с собой по нашей просьбе)
6 - что рядом:
Ничего, по большому счету...
Если выйти на дорогу, встать спиной к отелю и пойти налево, то минут через 12 будет винный магазин (через дорогу).
Но идти очень не комфортно, так как тротуаров совсем нет...
До того, как дойдете до винного магазина, тоже через дорогу, видела мясной магазин (с сырым мясом), которое можно прекрасно приготовить самостоятельно!
7 - где купить минимально продукты и напитки:
берете тук тук на территории нашего отеля и едете с ним в Хиккадуву до отеля Цитрус Хиккадува (2000 рупий туда и обратно такса).
Через дорогу от этого отеля есть супермаркет, в котором мы покупали яйца, растительное масло, хлеб, некоторые фрукты, сыр (который оказался плавленным, типа тостерного). Ну и много перекусов: печенье, чипсы, орешки есть.
На втором этаже алкомаркет: выбор хороший, цены смотрите на фото.
8 - океан:
волны были большие каждый день, но с утра поменьше как то.
Купаться сложно, так как волна сбивает с ног и обратное течение не слабое.
Но около берега можно прекрасно бороться с остатками волны и весело побарахтаться) Поплавать от берега не получится!
Кто с детками: только со взрослым заходить в воду!!! И если ребенок копошится около воды, тоже следить! Очень внимательно!!!
Спасатель каждый день внимательно наблюдает за всеми купающимися, но не рискуйте!
9 - пляж:
великолепный ярко желтый (даже немного оранжевый) песок, по структуре, как крупная соль, достаточно чистый, но все таки иногда попадаются мелкие нюансы: фантики, окурки и др...
При заходе в океан сначала этот песок, а через метра 3 очень приятные мелкий песочек!
Лежаков иногда не всем хватало, но сотрудники отеля приносили все возможные варианты (сиденье от дивана, мягкие кресла).
Пресный душ находится в ветвях дерева на территории рядом с краном для ног.
Его не видно, но он там есть!)
10 - рестораны Хиккадувы:
ездили пару раз на ужин, были в двух разных кафе, рестораном назвать не могу...
Нормально, если одним словом... С нашим рестораном в отеле близко нельзя сравнивать: вроде и стараются, и подача красивая, и коктейли интересные, но вот муравьи, которые тоже хотят полакомиться твои блюдом, песок под ногами, аскетичный теалет, раковина для мытья рук, где нет чем руки вытереть или высушить... Меня не порадовала даже живая музыка, которая было хороша...
11 - Галле:
Рядом есть городок Галле (в противоположную сторону от Хиккадувы).
Там есть форд, который является достоянием Юнеско.
Обязательно к посещению: погулять, пройтись по магазинчикам с сувенирами и украшениями, посмотреть архитектуру прошлого!
Мы там купили самые простецкие роти по 200 рупий в уличном павильончике, вот это было очень вкусно!!!
В целом отель очень понравился, персонала очень много, все приветливые и старательные, намеков на чаевые не было вообще.
title: Подробный отзыв об отеле и не только!

placeInfo/address: 503 Galle Road, Rathgama 80260 Sri Lanka
text:
We had a wonderfull stay at this hotell. It is perfectly located on the beach, a short distance to the busier part of Hikkaduwa. The standard was consistently high, the rooms was large and tasteful, and the service excellent. 

The staff were consistently attentive and service minded.

Lovely view from the hotel's restaurant and pool area on the top floor.
title: A wonderfull stay

placeInfo/address: 503 Galle Road, Rathgama 80260 Sri Lanka
text: It was an excellent stay at Crystal Sands close by the lovely suthern beach. Hospitality offered by the whole team was at its best. @Asela Jayasekare made the reservation more convenient and @Dilki and team made the dininig at the restaurant remarkable.
title: Excellent Hospitality

placeInfo/address: 503 Galle Road, Rathgama 80260 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Есть парковка, с собой можно брать только личные вещи, остальное есть в отеле
text:
Этот отель стал настоящей находкой, наткнулась на него случайно, привлекли красивые фотографии. В реальности все выглядит еще круче. 
Отдыхали с молодым человеком, всё очень понравилось, персонал очень дружелюбный, сервис на уровне, номер убирали каждый день.
На завтрак 5 дней был шведский стол, остальные дни по меню, ужин всегда по меню. Всё очень вкусно. Отдельно хочу отметить  Dilki, очень милая и дружелюбная девушка. 
В номере очень красивый вид с балкона, дизайн номеров стильный и современный, есть все необходимое.
Море всегда с волнами, штиля нет. Но волны небольшие, мы купались каждый день, вполне комфортно.
Магазинов рядом нет, можно за 5-10 минут доехать до ближайшего на тук-туке. 
В целом, нам очень понравилось в данном отеле, если прилетим еще раз на Шри-Ланку, то остановимся тут. Уже посоветовали его друзьям.
title: Отличный отпуск

placeInfo/address: 503 Galle Road, Rathgama 80260 Sri Lanka
roomTip: hotel prices include an additional tax that is not visible in the price lists
text: Very comfortable stay at the Crystal Sands hotel, largely due to the spacious apartment offering all the necessary amenities and the highly professional hotel service. At this point, special thanks to Mrs. Deepani and Onela from the guest service and to Mr. Dayan, the lifeguard taking care of safety on the beach. However, the cuisine deserves special attention. The excellent taste of the dishes, especially the presentation of the meals and the taste - will remain in the memory for a long time. In turn, thanks to the very nice service of people such as Mr. Rasindu and Mrs. Kavindi - our stay in the restaurant was a great experience every time. Special thanks for the valuable recommendations to the hotel employee (green uniform) whom we had the pleasure of seeing every day on the way to the beach - hospitality at its best. To sum up - we recommend this facility warmly.
title: Crystal Sands super comfortable hotel for a stay with two children

placeInfo/address: 503 Galle Road, Rathgama 80260 Sri Lanka
text:
I recently stayed at Crystal Sands, and overall, it was a pleasant experience. The rooms were clean, spacious, and well-maintained. The staff was polite and helpful, ensuring a smooth check-in and check-out process. The location was convenient, close to major attractions and public transportation.

The breakfast spread was decent, though it could have had more variety. One downside was the Wi-Fi, which was a bit slow at times. However, the overall ambiance and service made up for it.

Would recommend this hotel for a comfortable and hassle-free stay.
title: Perfect

placeInfo/address: 503 Galle Road, Rathgama 80260 Sri Lanka
roomTip: You don't need to take anything special with you, if anything, you can ask for everything at the reception. You can cook everything yourself in your room, parking yes
text: Very nice hotel, lovely rooms, friendly staff. Upon arrival in Sri Lanka, you should definitely visit this hotel, you can buy seafood nearby and cook right in the room. Everything is nearby, the beach is very nice. The staff is kind and helpful, helps with everything. For me this hotel is 10/10.
title: Did you come to Sri Lanka? Be sure to visit Crystal Sands!

placeInfo/address: 503 Galle Road, Rathgama 80260 Sri Lanka
text:
This place came highly recommended by our tour planners (Uditha and the team) in Sri Lanka. It’s was well worth it and perfect way to end our vacation. We traveled almost all over the country after traveling a lot this was the best place to relax with very polite and friendly staff along with delicious food. 

Will stay here again next time as well.
title: Amazing trip to Sri Lanka

placeInfo/address: 503 Galle Road, Rathgama 80260 Sri Lanka
roomTip: There are no stores in the walking distance around. But it takes about 15 minutes on tuk tuk to get to the Hikkaduwa beach area.
text: We went there with the family to celebrate New Year’s eve and spend a week after. The rooms are very nice and comfortable, the views are just so so stunning. We loved our huge balcony with the plunge pool and again the views are just insane. The staff is very friendly and attentive, they accommodate literally every request that you have. Also they have a very good restaurant on the top floor. they got a huge variety from western to local food, we went there many times during our stay in the hotel, and we tried many items and everything was so tasty! Also the service was great. Dilki was always very attentive, as the rest of the staff. Very pleasant experience. That’s a perfect hotel if you are looking to spend a vacation in quite peace and top service comfort.
title: Amazing experience

placeInfo/address: Matara Road Kathaluwa, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
text: South point villas are truly a magical place. We travelled as a family of 6 the youngest 5 and the oldest 63. We all had the best time. Comfortable beds, nice pool, brilliant service, beautiful beach location. The staff go above and beyond to make your stay comfortable and memorable. The food is amazing and every meal is prepared freshly cooked for every meal. I would definitely recommend. Thank you all you were fabulous 😊
title: Paradise within paradise

placeInfo/address: Matara Road Kathaluwa, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Do not waste a chance to book this hot selling property.
text: It was an absolutely amazing stay at South point vila. The superhost Sonali ensured that we had a comfortable stay along with well curated international cuisines. The care takers and the staff were prompt in providing our requirements. The amenities were 5 star. I truly appreciate and highly recommend this property for destination functions and peaceful, calm stays. Thank you once again.
title: Memories made ❤️

placeInfo/address: Matara Road Kathaluwa, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
text: Highly recommend South Point Villa for your next vacation accommodations!  We had an awesome time - beautiful ocean view, great food, excellent facilities and customer service.  Will definitely go back when I'm next in Sri Lanka.
title: Great Vacation Spot - South Point Villa

placeInfo/address: Matara Road Kathaluwa, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
roomTip: There is a binder as you enter the premises with places of interest and activities.  Please ask the staff if any of these interest you.
text: South Point Villa is located in the southern part of Sri Lanka.  It is an ocean front property.  From the dining area the view of the ocean is spectacular.  We thoroughly enjoyed our stay.  The food was amazing and its a wonderful place to rest and rejuvenate.
title: Get away spot for rest and relaxation.

placeInfo/address: Matara Road Kathaluwa, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
text:
Hi,
We had an extremely fantastic stay at South Point. The location of your hotel is perfect, with stunning views and easy access to the beach. The staff was incredibly efficient and friendly, making sure our stay was as comfortable as possible. I have to compliment your chef for her culinary expertise. The grilled fish with the pepper sauce was amazing. 
The room was spacious and well maintained, with all the necessary amenities provided. The magnificent view of the sea was an added bonus. 
All in all we had a wonderful time at the hotel and would highly recommend it to
anyone looking for a comfortable, relaxing stay with friendly staff and beautiful surroundings. 
Thanks again
Sonali
title: South point villa

placeInfo/address: Matara Road Kathaluwa, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Bring lots of sun lotion! Both the pool on the property and beach (literally, at your backyard) are very tempting.
text: Situated adjacent to the beautiful coral-studded and turquoise beach at Ahangama, I stayed for two nights at the Ocean Point villa. Apart from the ideal location, the accommodation was very comfortable and has excellent facilities. The staff were very friendly, accommodating and speak English well. I especially commend the chef here, whose skills with both Sri Lankan and Western fare are very impressive (perhaps the best Sri Lankan food I've had in the country thus far - and much better than anything in Melbourne). Overall, an extremely hospitable and relaxing stay, highly recommended!
title: Superb location, accommodation and food!

placeInfo/address: Matara Road Kathaluwa, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
roomTip: You have to cross the road to access the beach but on the other hand you have your private pool by your house.
text: We stayed in The Chalet for 5 nights! The house is lovely and we really enjoyed the outdoor space. Staff is very nice, food is good and when there was a construction going on at the neighbor we were offered a nice solution. This is a quit part of the coastal stretch but there are many nice restaurants and things to do a short tuktuk ride away.
title: Nice and tranquil oasis perfect for families!

placeInfo/address: Matara Road Kathaluwa, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
text:
We visited South Point Villa for the second time last year; it was the best,as always!! Absolutely beautiful.                                                                                                                                     

Well maintained villa and garden and a serene beach, that feels very private.
A glorious place to have a memorable holiday!!

The food is exellent, I would recommend you to tast the local cuisine! It is exellent.
Big thank you, to the staff that made it a dream vacation. 
See you soon.
title: Out standing place!!

placeInfo/address: Matara Road Kathaluwa, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
text: Wonderful experience in this beautiful beachfront villa. We stayed here for a few days and enjoyed the cosy decorated house and amazing outdoor space. The beach is very private and you can go for a safe swim or take your snorkel gear. The rooms are very spacious, clean and well decorated. Staff is very friendly and the food is to die for. From this location it is easy to visit Fort Galle or surf hotspot Weligama. Enjoy this gem!
title: Wonderful experience in this beautiful beachfront villa.

placeInfo/address: Matara Road Kathaluwa, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
text: I can't recommend South Point Villa enough! We had the most beautiful stay with family during our Christmas holiday. The house is stunning, filled with the most tasteful furniture and artworks. Nothing beats the view from the deck, you basically have your own private beach. Sometimes horses walk across the beach, it's magical! And honestly, we had the best Sri Lankan food at South Point. We spent about a month in the country and this was, hands down, the best food we had. The staff is so lovely and looked after our every need. I'm planning to come back to this gorgeous place again and again!
title: Most dreamy and luxurious place in Sri Lanka

placeInfo/address: Matara Road Kathaluwa, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
text: Extraordinary beachfront villa with spacious and very stunning (spotless!) rooms. The location is very private with gorgeous views. The staff is very sweet and extremely helpful. The food is delicious! (The best we had during our stay in Sri Lanka!) I would highly recommend South Point Villa. Thank you for making our holiday unforgettable!
title: Memorable stay at South Point

placeInfo/address: Matara Road Kathaluwa, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
text:
Recently we have been visited to this stunning property, it was absolutely gorgeous overlooking the ocean.

We had a fantastic lunch with the property owner and it was the best lunch we ever had. Also the staffs were very professional  into details and look after us very well. 

Definitely we will visit again and recommend for our friends.
title: Stunning venue

placeInfo/address: Matara Road Kathaluwa, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
text:
The South Point villas are absolutely stunning, 
One of the best villas to stay at in the south of Sri Lanka. 
The staff are extremely helpful and attention to detail is absolutely amazing. 
The food is out of this world and will keep you asking for more. 
The location is stunning and will recommend to anyone to stay at one of the villa’s
title: South Point Villa’s

placeInfo/address: Matara Road Kathaluwa, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
roomTip: If you do not want peace and tranquility this is not the place for you
text: Wow couldn’t fault this experience at all from start to finish. We were lucky enough to spend five serendipitous days at South Point. If your thinking of going and are looking for a true Sri Lankan experience in traditional surroundings with happy smiley attentive staff then do not hesitate. We felt from the first moments that this was our home here in this beautiful country. Our every need was attended to quietly but efficiently. We will be repeaters.
title: Serendipity

placeInfo/address: Matara Road Kathaluwa, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
text: I’ve visited south point villa now more than 4 times and each time the service keeps getting better and better. This property is absolutely beautiful. The staff pays so much attention to detail and also go out of their way to make sure your stay is comfortable and a memorable one. I can’t recommend this place more! South point villa is an absolutely beautiful and breathtaking property with access to a private beach. You can’t find anything better than this!
title: AMAZING SERVICE! & stunning property!

placeInfo/address: Matara Road Kathaluwa, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
text: The most incredible place. I cannot express how homely, relaxing and perfect it is spending time here. The staff working were absolutely perfect - so friendly, so attentive. The chefs are impeccable and very accommodating (my brother in law is severely celiac and they catered for him without any hindrance.) The views and setting in the accommodation are next level, I could not wish for anything better.  You could not wish for anything more for a family holiday -  It’s safe to say that I cannot wait to return.
title: A must visit!

placeInfo/address: Matara Road Kathaluwa, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
text:
We went with 8 adults and 1 infant to South Point Surf House

Staff: 
From the very first call to inquire about to location we were greeted with utmost professionalism. They understand their customers so well. They even went to the extent of providing a cot for the baby. Gamini (the manager) greeted us at the gate ( he was also worried when we got a bit late to arrive) and constantly checked if we needed anything. Anil who was handling maintenance ensured we were comfortable in every way! Even helped us with the BBQ. Mali the cook and her daughters were also friendly and ever so helpful. In our many years of traveling we have not come across such helpful staff - They are the  the definition of true Sri Lankan Hospitality.

Facilities:
The location was clean and well maintained. The pool was a blessing on a hot April afternoon. 

Location:
We were allowed to spend the evenings at the beach front villa. The almost private beach and the settled sea was an amazing experience. My favorite attraction was Randy and Niko, the resident Dobermanns! For a few pets they will pay fetch and accompany you where ever you go.
title: One of the best experiences!

ownerResponse/text: Thank you Matt for staying at The chalet.  We are so happy everyone enjoyed their stay.  We look forward to warmly welcoming you back to our properties soon.
placeInfo/address: Matara Road Kathaluwa, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
text:
Excellent chalet stay with excellent location and only a 1 minute walk to the picturesque beach at the beautiful village of Koggala. 

The house was extremely clean & secure - it’s colonial style added charm and comfort . 

Upon arrival we were warmly welcomed by the friendly staff who were happy to help with any request we presented. We were kindly given access to the beach villas which were stunning whilst no guests were present. These villas would also make very memorable stays. 

Would definitely recommend South Point Villas to everybody! It's fantastic place and our kids had the holiday of their lives!

text:
Beautiful hotel right on the river away from the hustle and bustle of Kandy with the most peaceful vibes and incredible service.

The room was massive with a huge terrace that included a jaccuzi overlooking the river. The AC worked perfect, everything was spotlessly clean, fresh and modern. The mini bar was generously included for one round during your stay which was amazing as there were medium bottles of liquor included.

The restaurant was wonderful, the Sri Lankan curry was incredibly delicious, with such friendly attentive service throughout.

I was only there one night on a stop over so did not use the pool facilities but it was beautiful and massive overlooking the river with an open air concept lobby like you were on a Caribbean Island.

All the service throughout was so friendly, welcoming and attentive. I loved this hotel and would highly recommend for anyone passing through Kandy.
title: Beautiful Oasis

text:
The Jetwing Kandy hotel was the second on our journey around Sri Lanka. This was 
another great experience (we arrived from Sigiriya where we stayed at Vil Uyana).

This is a relatively new hotel with 26 rooms. The “luxury” rooms we had were large, and very well thought through, the bathrooms were equally spacious.

This is a wonderful property, serene, quiet and restful with a great location (note the hotel is about 11km from Kandy town centre so you miss out all the noise and traffic).  

All of the hotel staff were absolutely amazing and friendly, special recognition to Vijitha who was assigned to look after us during our stay, and made it even more memorable.

The food was delicious, both International and Sri Lankan cuisines. They went above and beyond (proud) to showcase local cuisines offering us samples of certain local dishes ( a big thank you to Mr Leukebandara for the suggestions) .  A final salute to the Chef/ cooks for keeping us very well fed.

Highly recommend this hotel, you won’t be disappointed.
title: Wonderful hotel , great location outside of hustle and bustle of Kandy

text:
It has taken me some time to write this review, for which I annoyed at myself! What an incredible 9days we had at the Max Waydia. The staff were incredible the service first class and the food out of this world! They truly could not do enough to make our holiday magical. The children loved seeing the turtles hatch and releasing them into the beautiful sea at the bottom of the garden.

I have to make a special mention to Rajan who took care of all of us so well, his food was incredible new delights ever single day! We were spoilt.

Thanks to the team at Max Waydia for a truly magical holiday in paradise :)
title: Incredible what a place what a team!

ownerResponse/text:
Dear Naomi and Charles,
Thank you so much for this wonderful review! 
Having such thoughtful and appreciative guests makes it so worthwhile!
Warm regards from Ruth and the Max Wadiya team
placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
text:
We came to Max Wadiya to relax after a hectic tour of India. It more than delivered. We could not have wished for a more perfect place. Our Tangerine Suite had everything we could have needed; a comfy bed with crisp linens and mosquito net (we didn't have a problem with mosquitos but liked the idea!), private bathroom with two showers, a little kitchen with fridge, coffeemaker and kettle, a sitting room with desk and sofa and an outdoor porch. 

Ranjan and the team anticipated our every need whether it was afternoon tea, getting a taxi to go into Galle, buying tonic waters or a meal request. And yes, the food. Phenomenal. Who knew there were so many amazing Sri Lankan curries, wonderful fresh seafood, local vegetables and fruits? We were excited for every meal...and we were full board :)

The pool is lovely with shaded and sunny spots. Several hammocks for snoozing. The beach is deserted, clean and the sea quite swimmable when we were there. We enjoyed the turtle related activities and watching the fishermen in what seemed quite a difficult community net pulling exercise!

Special shoutout to Tyron who gave us both the best massages. He is really gifted and thoughtful in his massage technique. Unforgettable.

In short, we hope to return and do more exploring next time. This place is a real gem.
title: A perfect place to relax

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
text:
Such an impressive bespoke set up. A couple of villas, with loads of space each, a great pool and a permanent view of a virtually deserted beach. But that's not even the best bit.

The best bit is the five star cooked-to-order food, all freshly prepared and presented on site. Ranjan and his team worked wonders in the kitchen coming up with something to suit everyone, three meals a day. All with a smile.

And when we were there - I had asked him in advance about any turtle hatcheries nearby...that night we released freshly-hatched turtles from the beach. Truly a highlight of our trip.

It's not a touristy part of Sri Lanka, but the team will sort any visits out you want. Just don't expect to walk to a quaint local village.

For us, it was perfect. We were at the end of our visit. We wanted pure relaxation. And we got it.
title: A five star place to relax

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Bring your own drink.  It's not licensed but you can drink your own with meals.
text: We stayed at 6 hotels during our 3 weeks in Sri Lanka most of which were 5*.  Nowhere beat this place for service, food and comfort.   The view of the sunset was perfect and we saw turtles hatch and make their way to the sea.  We spent 4 nights of pure bliss here with a great massage on the last day.   The only downside was that we had to leave!
title: The best of Sri Lanka

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
text: Our second visit, the first in 2008, was just as magical. Rajan and his fantastic team took care of everything, including celebrating my mother-in-laws 80th birthday. The place had changed - the garden landscaped beautifully and the pool was a very welcome addition, but the old house remained magical and the semi-private beach a real highlight. Thank you so much!
title: A return trip with family after 20 years

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
text: Abbiamo trascorso 4 giorni indimenticabili in questa piacevolissima villa in stile coloniale sul mare. La bellezza e la cura dei dettagli della struttura e delle suite e le costanti attenzioni dello staff hanno reso la nostra vacanza davvero speciale. I pasti sono un tripudio di sapori, con ingredienti freschissimi locali preparati con sapienza e varietà dallo chef, sempre attento alle esigenze di ciascuno dei suoi ospiti. Abbiamo assaporato tanti piatti diversi della cucina locale e ci siamo deliziati con colazioni, pranzi e cene sontuose, consumati sotto il gazebo in spiaggia o sul patio privato, latte di cocco a metà mattina in piscina e the e dolcetti a merenda! Il giardino, con una bellissima piscina e una  spiaggia privata ombreggiata dalle palme è l'ideale per rilassarsi e staccare completamente. Tra le tante esperienze abbiamo seppellito le uova di tartaruga, che l'hotel salva periodicamente acquistandole direttamente dai pescatori, in un apposito nido per le uova. Tutta la gestione della struttura è infatti orientata alla tutela dell'ambiente e alla salvaguardia della natura.
title: Un paradiso sul mare, esperienza unica

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
text: Beautiful little hotel on a beautiful beach. The rooms are very spacious and well equipped.  The owner, the manager and the entire team are very friendly, and they helped us with everything we needed. Ranjan, the manager, is also the chef and every day of our stay he surprised us with delicious breakfasts, lunches and dinners. With the pool, the beach and the friendly staff, the Max Wadiya is an ideal place for families, couples or groups who prefer to stay a bit off the more crowded spots in the area.
title: Beautiful place to relax

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
text: We had the most perfect holiday at Max Wadiya. I arrived worn down with work and winter and left completely restored and smiley. You couldn't hope for more attentive staff, more delicious food, more comfortable accommodation or a more exquisite spot. Ranjan is a a fantastic cook - every meal was a culinary delight. I was able to come to learn and love Sri Lankan food but also enjoy some more familiar favourites. Nothing compares to finishing a day of reading in a hammock, jumping the waves or into the pool, with a drink on the sunset deck.
title: The perfect holiday

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
text: Heavenly place - everything is done to give you a stress free time. The food is incredible. The staff all delightful. The rooms perfect. We missed it as soon as we left… if you’re lucky enough to go - you’ll know what I mean. Paradise Sri Lanka style
title: Bliss. It’s literally the most relaxing and heavenly place ever. Tailored to give you everything you want. No stress……..

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
text: This is a real gemstone among places to stay in Sri Lanka. Beautiful small paradise where you can enjoy every minute of your holiday. We have travelled to many 5 stars hotels all over the world and never felt so comfortably as in Max Wadiya. The staff is friendly and helpful and Ranjan - the manager - is so kind and always there in need. Another thing that was above any expectations were the meals. The variety of dishes that could be ordered is enormous and every one of them delicious. It was great pity to leave this place. Ideal place for those who want comfort but don't  like the big hotels.
title: A treasure in Sri Lanka

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
text:
This was our first time visiting Sri Lanka and we felt we stayed home away from home. We have travelled many places and have never felt so welcome, relaxed and truly at home with family. We have spent the past 10 days on a family holiday in paradise. Ranjan and the team are amazing! They go above and beyond catering for your every needs in terms of food, etc. We stayed with our three children. We all enjoyed every minute of our stay. Wish we could stay longer! The incredible food full of soul, and love made by Ranjan and the chefs is delicious. Ranjan has made us fall in love with Sri Lankan cuisine. We’re definitely going to miss his cooking! 

The hospitality from all of the staff is superb. 
The moments spent in the pool, walking on the beach, building sandcastles, the children playing with the dog, Leo, listening to the ocean waves when waking up and going to sleep are memories we will forever cherish. 
We will miss Max Wadiya and hope to be back soon again. 

Thank you.
title: A Holliday in Paradise

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
text: Serene and magical place with the best hospitality. Thank you Ruth, Ranjan and team. We have returned for a second visit and thoroughly enjoyed our time once again. Delicious cuisine and amazing views of the ocean. Always exceeding our expectations!
title: Second time back to this beautiful gem

ownerResponse/text:
Dear Keri and John,
Reading this made me want to jump on a plane and head out to Max Wadiya!!
There is nothing more rewarding than appreciative guests who “get” what we’re offering!
Thank you for being such wonderful guests!
placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
text: The Max Wadiya is a natural haven of warmth, love, and hospitality. We began our days sipping mango juice and freshly brewed coffee, ending them by releasing new-born turtle hatchlings into the sea under fuchsia skies. The vast, lush gardens are teeming with wildlife. On our last day we woke up to air fragranced with sandalwood from new year celebrations, jasmine, and salt from the Indian Ocean. What the owners have built here is not just a beautiful private home, it is a family – a community of life. Of all the places we have visited in our 40 years of travel, nothing has left us with unshakable memories quite like the Max Wadiya. Ranjan is a gifted manager, nothing is too much trouble, and the team – Indika, Chandima, Thanndu, Roshan, Sarath, and Mendis – are so warm and welcoming. The food, the food…! Deeply flavourful curries, lobster on the beach, fat river prawns doused with homemade garlic butter…meals made with soul and spirit. If you are a stressed-out executive looking to recharge, a large multigenerational family (up to 10), or a honeymoon couple – the Max Wadiya will have something for you. Pad barefoot across pristine sands for a morning swim in the sea, lounge in hammocks nestled in the coconut grove, settle into a post-lunch Ayurvedic massage, or frolic in the aquamarine pool (a good size for swimming laps). All in the privacy of a sanctuary under 2-hours from Bandaranaike International, and 40m from the historic fort of Galle. Plenty of activities are on offer: visits to the famous mask museum, tea plantations, lagoon trips, jungle trekking, river bathing – and more. The suites are adjoined, but slightly separate from the main villa and feel self-contained. Worth mentioning they each have a little kitchenette with fridge. Mendis is the security guard who looks after the property at night, so you can rest easy. Don’t wait – book it! You’ll create lasting memories… and an experience that might just change your life.
title: A private, safe, and peaceful beachfront haven – simply paradise.

ownerResponse/text:
All of us at Max Wadiya thank you for being such lovely, appreciative guests!
The staff were truly sorry to see you leave and would like you to return very soon!
placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
text: I can't give enough stars for how well we were treated whilst staying at Max Wadiya.  From the moment we arrived we were treated with such wonderful attention, from the amazing curries and daily dishes prepared by Ranjan and the team, to the fresh coconuts brought to us at the pool and the ice cream on tap for our children.  I was worried our children who range from 9 to 4 would be bored as we booked the main villa for 12 days.  Not at all! We strolled on the beach and the children played in the pool for hours, hung out in the hammocks, made sandcastles and happily ran around the property.  Ranjan and his team organised a birthday breakfast for our son whilst we were there, which he loved.  We took a few trips up to the towns close by as they are also in easy reach from the property and for a longer trip to Galle, we booked a taxi.  But there was equally no need to leave!  Everything we needed was organised by Ranjan.  Nothing was too much trouble and so we barely had to think :-)  It was an amazing holiday and we all had a chance to unwind and relax.  We absolutely loved our trip to Sri Lanka and I can't recommend Max Wadiya enough.  Thank you so much for all the wonderful hospitality.  We dearly miss the daily breakfasts served by the sea and we will definitely be back!
title: Wonderful Villa with amazing staff, highly recommended.

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
text: Max Wadiya is as close to Heaven on Earth as possible. Located bang on the cleanest and most private beach. Beautiful rooms impeccably maintained, lovely pool, garden and hard working staff. Been there 5 times. Can't wait for my next trip!!
title: Heaven on Earth!

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Try and spend at least 4 days at the Max Wadiya. There is so much to see and do!
text:
This was my 8th time at the Max Wadiya and it seems to get better every time! 

For me - everything that makes a holiday exceptional comes together at the Max Wadiya. 

The beach on which the villa is set is perhaps the cleanest beach in Sri Lanka - and it almost seems like a private beach. 

One night when walking on the beach dinner we were fortunate enough to see a turtle coming in to lay eggs. The eggs were later rescued from dogs and poachers by the folks at Max Wadiya and kept in the hatchery near their swimming pool. 

Coming to the food served at the Max Wadiya, it is exceptional! Every meal is different, well presented and absolutely delicious! 

Finally, what makes Max Wadiya remarkable is the hospitality and graciousness shown to us by Ranjan and his staff. Nothing is too much trouble for them. They are unobtrusive, but always there to address any ask that you may have. 

Perhaps in this short note I have been able to convey why I have made a trip to Max Wadiya and integral part of my vacation calendar for the year.
title: Yet another outstanding vacation at the Max Wadiya!

ownerResponse/text:
Truly delighted you and the family enjoyed your stay with us. The Max Wadiya team told me it was an absolute joy to have you at the hotel!
Come and visit us again soon!
placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Ask for Sri Lankan food rather than western. The Sri Lankan cuisine is amazing.
text: This is the one of the best hotels we have ever stayed at. From massages to cooking lessons, yoga to beach cricket; this hotel did everything. Ranjan the manager and his team were lovely and couldn’t do enough for us. The food was amazing and the location was even better. Private beach and a pool!! What a treat. If you are going to Sri Lanka, Max Wadiya is the prime place to stay.
title: Great Stay for All Ages

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
text:
We had a marvellous short stay at Max Wadiya. This place is unlike any other accommodation I have experienced in Sri Lanka. It is a tropical utopia, tucked away behind a high wall where you are totally secluded from the hustle and bustle of the outside.
The location and grounds are fantastic, you are right at one of the best beaches on this stretch of coastline at your doorstep. You can peacefully relax by the pool or on a hammock under the many coconut trees in the tropical gardens, or just book in a massage or take in the sea breeze and sunsets.
Limited to about ten guests, Max Wadiya has a homely feel, unlike what many hotels offer. The villa that we stayed in was spacious with all the amenities. The excellent staff will go through any lengths to make your stay great, and are at your behest from the time you check in. 
The food was delicious, we enjoyed several of our meals under the gazebo. From breakfast to dinner, the kitchen will comply with your menu requests wherever possible.
If you are after a restful and peaceful vacation, then Max Wadiya should be on your list.
We would have loved to extend our stay, but we have full intentions of going back to this unique wonderful place.
title: The Perfect Place

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Ne pas oublier la lotion anti moustiques
text:
Véritable havre de paix au milieu de longues plages de sable doré.

Déconnexion totale dans cet hôtel où le manager, Ranjan, fait le maximum pour vous rendre votre séjour le plus agréable possible.
Il est présent 7 jours sur 7.

La nourriture est excellente, différente chaque jour.

Suite avec vue sur mer (à qq pas de la plage), très grande terrasse.

Endroit à recommander pour une parenthèse totale dans un lieu idyllique.
title: Un petit coin de paradis

ownerResponse/text: Dear Ivana and Tara, it was an absolute pleasure to have you stay with us. Ivana, we are so honoured that you remembered Max Wadiya after your first visit which was 22 years ago!

placeInfo/address: Aluthgama Road, Neboda 00200 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Book your massage treatments in advance if you can!
text: This was the last place on my 2 week itinerary and I came alone with no real expectations. I left 2 days later with a heavy heart! The accommodation units are amazing! Really stunning views over the valley below and I loved the soundproofed chill out lounge underneath the mezzanine floor and next to the fabulous pool. The highlight here is the environment coupled with the attentive service and the excellent wellness area. I had 3 treatments in total including a chocolate blissful wrap which was amazing! I took advantage of the complimentary Yoga which again was 1st class and I even did a great woodland walk with the charming and knowledgeable Dinesh who came all the way from Columbo for it. If that's not 5* service I don't know what is! Larry and his team looked after me we well and the food and restaurant setting was superb. I would highly recommend this property for those seeking peace and quiet and looking for a relaxing few days either at the start or end of any trip to Sri Lanka. Only 80 mins from Columbo it's a real find! Thank you.
title: Saved the best till last!

placeInfo/address: Aluthgama Road, Neboda 00200 Sri Lanka
text: Glenross living is a beautiful hotel tucked in a rubber/cinnamon plantations with beautiful hill views, we stayed in the pool villa which was very tastefully designed and very spacious and private. The service from all staff members was excellent, and the each meal we had was wonderful. For lunch and dinner they provide 5 courses and can be eaten in the comfort of your villa. We also enjoyed the complimentary one hour yoga session by a well trained Indian yoga teacher. The spa treatments were also very good and relaxing. Overall we had an excellent and relaxing stay and the pricing was very reasonable, highly recommend this place to everyone looking for relaxation or a getaway.
title: A relaxing holiday

placeInfo/address: Aluthgama Road, Neboda 00200 Sri Lanka
text: We had an amazing experience at glenross. We booked a pool villa which had a breathtaking view! Villas were very nicely maintained with all the equipment and was very spacious!! The food was amazing as well all meals were prepped to perfection! Throughout our stay we were constantly in touch with Ajith who always bore a very welcoming smile and was ready to assist us with anything and everything! We’d like to thank Mr Shamil, Rathnayake, Kapila, Chamath, the chefs (Nimal, Upul, Tharindu and Ranjith) as well as Upali and the team for making our stay very relaxing and memorable for us! We would surely visit again and would highly recommend glenross living for anyone who’s looking for some comfort and relaxing not so far away from Colombo!
title: Breathtaking views, amazing food and very high quality service!

placeInfo/address: Aluthgama Road, Neboda 00200 Sri Lanka
text:
Glenross Living is an absolute gem in the Kalutara area; a must try experience. From arrival to departure we had the best hospitality from everyone at Glenross.

We stayed at the Cinnamon Pool Villa and there are no words to describe it. It was very spacious, with the bedroom and bathroom on the top level, and a separate tv lobby and plunge pool on the lower level. The plunge pool has a beautiful view, especially towards evening.
Everything was very clean and well organized. Upali and the housekeeping team has done an excellent job. They also quickly helped us when a sudden rain wet the floor because the sliding doors were open.

Upon check-in we were offered a complimentary shoulder massage as well as a complimentary yoga session for the morning (this is also quite good to experience, even for someone who hasn't done yoga at all).
Ajith, Rathnayake, Kapila, Chamath, and all other staff members provided the most friendly hospitality and catered to all our needs promptly (especially thankful to them and Chef Nimal for finding Omeprazole for my acid reflux close to midnight).

The food is quite simply delicious. For full board, there is a set menu with a nice variety to choose from. Chef Nimal, Upul, Tharindu, and Ranjith have done an excellent job when it comes to the dishes and each meal was absolutely great.

The environment and ambience of the entire hotel is truly remarkable. It feels like disconnecting from your daily life and completely moving to another realm. The design concepts blend very well with the environment and for me it was a magical experience especially when it rains. The surrounding greenery takes an entirely different appearance during rain.

Before leaving we also had the pleasure of talking with Mr. Shamil, the General Manager. Kudos to Mr. Shamil for managing such a nice hotel where guests can feel extremely relaxed and comfortable as well as disconnect from their daily lives for a while.

Glenross Living is truly an absolutely remarkable experience that resembles a lifestyle more than the average stay at a hotel and we definitely plan to return someday.
title: A Truly  Relaxing Stay in Kalutara

placeInfo/address: Aluthgama Road, Neboda 00200 Sri Lanka
text: Our family holiday at Glenross was a delightful experience. A forest getaway one hour from Colombo. The welcome as we arrived was delightful. We were offered a free shoulder massage on arrival and free daily yoga sessions by an expert practitioner. The food was delicious and Ajith the general factotum at the resort was excellent in his care and attention to the guests and a real example of Sri Lankan hospitality. The villas we stayed in were beautifully designed with small personal swimming pools. Overall a delightful resort surrounded by nature for a quiet and relaxing getaway.
title: Glenross a getaway with a difference

placeInfo/address: 503 Galle Road, Rathgama 80260 Sri Lanka
text:
Чудесный отель, просторные и уютные номера, мы с легкостью разместились семьей из 5 человек, что бывает редко. Отзывчивый персонал от охраны, ресепшена и официантов!!! Ежедневная уборка номера, белоснежная постель, собственный бассейн в номере, шикарный пляж и вид на океан !!!! Посетили много интересных мест, благодаря местному водителю тук-тука.

placeInfo/address: Bentota 80500 Sri Lanka
placeInfo/name: Jetwing Saman Villas, A Luxury Reserve
roomTip: Englischkenntnisse sind eigentlich Voraussetzung
text:
Saman Villas liegt am südlichen Ende der Westküste Sri Lankas. Das Haupthaus und die einzelnen Lodges sind auf einem Felsen einige Meter über dem Meer erbaut worden, so dass man einen Ausblick auf 2 Strände und das Meer genießen kann. Die Architektur der gesamten Anlage ist zurückhaltend und zeitlos. Das Haupthaus ist zu beiden Ständen hin offen und bietet damit schöne Ausblicke, um z. B. den Sonnenuntergang zu verfolgen, was auch aus dem großen Pool möglich ist. 
Das Appartement selbst ist sehr gepflegt und großzügig. Auch hier, ein Teil des Bades hat kein  Dach, so dass man bei warmen Regen  in der großen Wanne sitzen kann. 
Das Essen ist gut (wir hatten Halbpension) und man kann bei Frühstück und Abendessen zwischen lokalen und westlichen Gerichten wählen.
Der Bereich für Wellness Behandlungen sind nur überdacht unter sonst freiem Himmel und haben wir gleich mehrfach genossen. 
Das Personal ist wie überall in SL sehr freundlich und zuvorkommend, man hat während des Aufenthalts einen persönlichen Butler. Englischkenntnisse sind Voraussetzung zur Verständigung, das Hotel ist nur für Erwachsene. 
Auf jeden Fall ist das Hotel empfehlenswert, wenn man einen ruhigen, stilvollen Strandurlaub genießen möchte. 
Ein Ort in dem man sich auch für einige Tage sehr wohl fühlen kann. Wir haben es zu Beginn unserer Sri Lanka Rundreise gewählt.
Abschließend sei noch erwähnt, dass das Hotel zur Jetwing Kette gehört, die sich der Nachhaltigkeit verschrieben und sich selbst z. B. klare CO2 Neutralitätsziele gesetzt hat.
title: Stilvolles Hotel in traumhafter Strandumgebung

placeInfo/address: Bentota 80500 Sri Lanka
placeInfo/name: Jetwing Saman Villas, A Luxury Reserve
text:
Everywhere you turn in this hotel there are stunning views of the surrounding beach and sea.

We were surprised to find we got our own butler for our stay. You are given a small mobile phone to contact them for anything at all you may need.
Our Butler, Niroshan, was amazing and was always there to greet us when we went for breakfast and dinner. He even set up our floating breakfast in the pool which was beautiful!

The villa was really spacious and had all the amenities you could want for your stay. We stayed in a few different locations in Sri Lanka and Jetwing was the only place where the air conditioning actually kept the room sufficiently cool in the heat and humidity!

There is access to both beaches either side with security making us feel extra safe. The beaches were both amazing and very quiet, often only another couple or 2 to share them with.

We were here for my birthday and they had decorated the bed and gave us a cake at dinner which was much appreciated!
title: Stunning pool villa with beach view

ownerResponse/text:
Dear guest,

Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughtful feedback on your second visit to Jetwing Saman Villas. We are thrilled to hear that you loved the experience during your first visit in January 2023 and decided to return for another stay.
We’re glad to know you enjoyed the unique atmosphere of our property, with its stunning views and the spacious villa-like rooms. We truly appreciate your kind words about the bathtub and the outdoor veranda. However, we do understand your concern regarding the step between areas, and we will certainly consider this feedback to improve the comfort of our guests.
It’s great to hear that you were able to relax and enjoy the complimentary foot massage at our spa and the lovely pool. We’re also pleased that you found our beach location and dining area to your liking.
We appreciate your honest comments regarding the dinner. We sincerely apologise for the 30-minute gap between courses and the quality of the cocktails. Your feedback has been passed along to our culinary team for further review, as we aim to provide a seamless and delightful dining experience for all of our guests.
Regarding the breakfast, we are glad you enjoyed the massive spread, but we regret that it did not meet the same high standards you experienced during your first visit. We will definitely look into this and work to ensure that the flavors remain consistent across all visits.
We also appreciate your recognition of our young, enthusiastic team.
Once again, thank you for your valuable feedback. We are delighted that your stay was overall pleasant and relaxing, and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon. We hope to exceed your expectations during your next visit.

Ayubowan! (May you live long!)

Farrel Blom
Deputy General Manager
placeInfo/address: Bentota 80500 Sri Lanka
placeInfo/name: Jetwing Saman Villas, A Luxury Reserve
text:
Actual rating 4.5

We visited this property in Jan 2023 and loved the experience, so we decided to visit again. 

This review is on the second visit. 

This boutique hotel is situated on a slightly rocky outcrop giving it a different vibe from a typical beach hotel and offering spectacular views. 

The rooms are more like villas, with an outside veranda, a living cum bed room and a spacious bathroom. My favorite part was the tub with the semi open roof. (But was not a fan of the small step separating each area as it was difficult to get used to on a short visit).

They have a nice looking spa where we got a 15 minute complimentary foot massage and a lovely pool. There are two large stretches of clean public beaches on either side of the property. The dining area too is quite spacious.

The dinner was a set menu. The appetizer and the soup was rather ordinary. The mains were pretty good though. But there was about a 30 minute gap between each course which was surprsing considering it was a set menu with 3-4 options. The real let down were the cocktails which were quite watery. 

The breakfast we had on our previous visit was one of the best we've had anywhere. There were only two choices, local or western but there was a whole series of dishes under each option and the flavors were spot on. This time, while the spread was still the same massive spread and the food was good, the flavors didn't come up to the high standards set last time. 

The staff were very young, very pleasant and very enthusiastic. But we missed the subtle professionalism of the more senior staff we met last time.
 
All in all it was a rather pleasant and relaxing experience. We would have given it 5 stars if not for the very high bar set on our previous visit.
title: Spectacular sunsets

ownerResponse/text:
Hello Dileepap, 

Firstly let me take this opportunity to thank you for choosing us again for your birthday celebration - it truly means the world to us when guests return to Sigiriya Water Garden. Your loyalty as a returning guest is something we deeply value.

I am delighted that you enjoyed the peaceful, serene atmosphere of our property and that the Deluxe Pool Villa met your expectations. 
A huge thank you for your kind words about Lahiru your Butler. I know he will be absolutely thrilled to hear how much his friendly and attentive service meant to you during your stay. Comments like these really make his day and ours too. 

I do want to sincerely apologize for the mix-up with your reservation, particularly regarding the early check-in request. I believe what may have happened is that when your booking got amended, some of your special requests - including the note about this being a birthday celebration and your second visit - may have gotten miscommunicated along the way. This is absolutely not the experience we want for any guest, especially someone celebrating a special occasion with us. I am disappointed that we did not properly acknowledge your birthday or your return visit from the very beginning. We should have made your celebration feel extra special right from check-in.

Thank you for the honest feedback about our reservation process. It is invaluable input that helps us improve and I will be working with our team to ensure these communication gaps don't happen again.

We would love to welcome you back for your next getaway. Please do contact me directly on gm@watergardensigiriya.com when you have planned your next visit so I can add some special touches to your next stay. 

With sunny regards from Sigiriya
David & the team
placeInfo/address: Indigaswewa, Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka
text:
This was our second visit to Sigiriya Water Garden, specially chosen to celebrate my birthday. While the property remains beautiful and peaceful — perfect for a relaxing getaway — the experience this time had some disappointments.

The reservation officer was not helpful when we requested an early check-in, which made our arrival less welcoming than expected. Moreover, despite mentioning that this was a special occasion and our second stay, there was no effort from the team to acknowledge or make the celebration memorable, which was a letdown.

On the positive side, the location is calm and serene, ideal for a quiet retreat. A special mention must go to Lahiru, our butler, who was very friendly, attentive, and made sure we were well taken care of throughout the stay. His excellent service really stood out.

The food was great, with a good variety and quality. We stayed in a Deluxe Pool Villa, which was spacious, clean, and beautifully maintained — a true highlight of the stay.

Overall, while the property and on-ground service (especially by Lahiru) are commendable, the reservation process and guest consideration could definitely be improved, especially for returning guests celebrating special occasions.
title: Beautiful Location and Villa, but Disappointed with Reservation Experience

roomTip:
All villas are wonderful. Stay anywhere you can. 
Walk out alone at 6am. 
Perfect
text:
One of the Best Stays We’ve Ever Had – A True Gem!
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

This hotel easily makes it into our top 3 of all time. From start to finish, our stay was outstanding.

We originally booked for three nights and left feeling it just wasn’t enough. After a disappointing experience at our next hotel, we made the easy decision to return—and ended up staying four more nights. It was even better the second time around.

Many travellers seem to use this as a short stopover, but we’re so glad we took the time to stay longer. During our first visit, we were busy with excursions and barely scratched the surface of what the resort offers. On our return, we truly relaxed—and had the chance to enjoy the incredible spa, serene pool area, and the warm, attentive hospitality.

The villas are spacious, private, and beautifully appointed. The staff are outstanding—welcoming, professional, and genuinely kind, from the front desk to the restaurant team. The food is excellent, with a wide variety from local specialities to international favourites—everything was delicious.

The grounds are simply magical. Wildlife is everywhere, and it’s like watching a live nature documentary unfold around you. Any bird lovers could stay here and see everything from eagles to crocodiles. 

This isn’t just a place to pass through—it’s a destination to settle into. Relaxing, beautiful, peaceful, and absolutely worth a longer stay. We’re already planning our return!
title: Cannot wait to return.

placeInfo/address: Indigaswewa, Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka
text:
From the moment we arrived at Water Garden Sigiriya, we were completely enchanted. The entire experience was nothing short of magical – peaceful, luxurious, and filled with thoughtful touches that made our stay truly special.

First and foremost, a huge thank you to Udara and Dinuka, who took care of us throughout the trip. Their warm hospitality, attention to detail, and genuine care made us feel incredibly welcome and pampered. They went above and beyond to ensure we had everything we needed and more – we truly felt like royalty!

The location is absolutely stunning – serene, lush, and beautifully designed. It felt like a hidden paradise surrounded by nature, with the iconic Sigiriya Rock just a short distance away. One of the most delightful surprises was the abundance of beautiful peacocks roaming freely across the property – an absolute treat to see them up close in such a tranquil setting.

The food was amazing – fresh, flavorful, and beautifully presented. Every meal felt like a celebration of Sri Lankan cuisine and international flavors, with a great variety that catered to all tastes.

Our room was super cozy and luxurious, with modern comforts and a beautiful view. The blend of rustic charm and contemporary elegance was perfect – it was the kind of space you never wanted to leave.

Water Garden Sigiriya is truly a gem – whether you’re looking for relaxation, nature, or a touch of adventure. We left with full hearts, unforgettable memories, and deep appreciation for the entire team. We can’t wait to return!
title: A Magical Escape at Water Garden Sigiriya – Unforgettable Experience!

placeInfo/address: Indigaswewa, Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka
roomTip: There was only two other couples there when we went! Start of the monsoon weather but it only rained in the night!
text:
Omg what a stunning place! So peaceful down a little road off the main one! 
Wildlife from alligators to 6-7 full grown peacocks roaming the grounds! Also saw monkey 🐵 too! 
We had a water villa with its own plunge pool, separate lounge and a fabulous four poster bed with the luxury bedding! 
Food was amazing too! Lots of choice and when it came a lot of it! So you won’t go hungry. 
My husband went for a massage at the Spa $80 dollars for 90 minutes he said it was one of the best he has had. And trust me he has had a few around a few destinations! 
Staff are amazing and they cannot do enough for you! 
I think there’s a total of 30 rooms and some of these are the water villas amongst the grounds! We shall be back. Only stayed two days as on a 9 day tour of Sri Lanka
title: One of the most beautiful places in Sri Lanka! 🇱🇰

placeInfo/address: Indigaswewa, Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka

It spoilt us all a little for the trip ha ha and we all said it would be a nice way to end a tour as well.   Thank you to all staff, you are amazing!!!!!

placeInfo/address: Indigaswewa, Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Make sure you allow yourself time to relax by the pool- this hotel is more than just  room to sleep in!
text: This hotel was absolute epitome of luxury. The rooms were stunning with all the amenities you could need, and lovely little extras such as fudge and coconut ice during turn down. The grounds are beautiful to walk around but there was also the buggy service if you didn’t feel like walking. The pool was beautiful and a relaxing area to lie by with a fantastic view of the lions rock. The breakfast was particularly amazing. The day I went to climb the rock at 5:30am our butler kindly collected me from my room in a buggy so that I didn’t have to navigate the ground in the dark, and I was greeted with a lovely pre packed breakfast to enjoy at the top of the rock! I then returned to the hotel and was greeted with a second breakfast which was very welcome. We were sad to check out of this hotel and wish we’d stayed for an extra day to relax and unwind.
title: Perfection!

placeInfo/address: Indigaswewa, Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka
text:
Watergarden was truly one of the highlights of our trip to Sri Lanka. The property is absolutely stunning — beautifully designed with an effortless sense of style and elegance. Every detail, from the landscaping to the architecture, feels intentional and luxurious.

The villas were perfectly appointed: spacious, beautifully decorated, incredibly comfortable, and of the highest quality. We loved starting each day with a swim in the gorgeous infinity pool and relaxing in the peaceful surroundings.

The food was easily the best we had during our entire stay in Sri Lanka — the hoppers at breakfast were a particular highlight (so delicious!). But what really set Watergarden apart was the warm, authentic, and truly exceptional service. Every interaction felt genuine and welcoming.

We can’t recommend Watergarden more highly — it was an unforgettable experience…
title: Style, Serenity, and Exceptional Service

text:
A very unique experience for both of us, we enjoyed our spacious Villa with all amenities catered for. Bluetooth speaker was the best we've encountered and a welcome addition to our room. ownerResponse/text:
Hello dibjab, 

Thanks so much for sharing your wonderful feedback about your stay with us. We are indeed thrilled to read that you enjoyed our natural surroundings and the wildlife. Our peacocks tend to be a natural wake-up call both when you need it and also when you do not yet they add such character to our little slice of paradise in Sigiriya. We are delighted that you loved our superior deluxe villa with the private plunge pool. They are one of our unique features and sell out fast. Great to also hear that we hit the spot with our dining options. 

We recently introduced our new 'Curated Menu Experience', an innovative dining program designed exclusively for our Half Board and Full Board guests. This personalised culinary initiative allows guests to collaborate with our Executive Chef Ruwan and craft a dinner menu of their choice. Through this bespoke service, guests have the opportunity to share their personal preferences with us and our expert chefs carefully curate a customized menu tailored to their tastes and also incorporating dietary constrains. Our commitment to culinary excellence ensures that every dish is prepared with the finest ingredients and presented with exceptional attention to detail. I do hope you had to opportunity to avail of this concept during your stay.

We hope to see you back again on your next visit to Sri Lanka. 

With sunny regards from Sigiriya
David & the team

Hello Geoff, 

Thank you for sharing your wonderful experience with us at Water Garden Sigiriya. We are absolutely delighted that you enjoyed your stay in our superior deluxe villa with private plunge pool. These villas are firm favourites with most of our guests. 

We are thrilled that you were able to experience some of our wellness offerings! placeInfo/address: Indigaswewa, Sigiriya 21120 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Beautiful infinity pool was quiet and serene. Restaurant staff very attentive and pleasant - as was any member of staff who we encountered
text:
Although supposedly modelled on the adjacent paddy fields, this stunning property with its contemporary design, beautiful villas and fantastic facilities couldn't be further from rural labour. We could have stayed in our lovely villa with its own plunge pool and overlooking the water garden without venturing out but the surrounding area offers many attractions - nor least of which is Sigariya Rock.
Yoga and wellness is a big part of the offering and my wife took full advantage of her session with Nikki, whilst I went photographing the wildlife around the grounds before slipping over and covering myself in mud  - my fault entirely but when you want a particular photo, common sense sometimes takes second place. A beautiful place to stay.
title: Serene in Sigariya

placeInfo/address: Matara Road Kathaluwa, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
text: South point Villas is a great place to be with your friends and family. Located right next to the beach, it provides great views, ocean breeze and plenty of accommodation, including an in-house chef. Highly recommended.
title: South Point Villa

roomTip: best views, large rooms
text: After a long mute from Vacations due to Covid 19, we finally decided to look for a Safe  and Secure place for me and my family for our much awaited holiday. Selecting South Point Villa - Abbey for the second time was the best decision I made as we had the best holiday ever!! The staff at South Point, made us feel that we are home away from home and ensured to look -in to every aspect to keep us happy through-out our stay!! Clean and Comfortable facilities, scrumptious food, coupled with a serine environment was all we had during our 3 day long stay!! What more can anybody ask for!!!
title: Amazing Stay at South Point Villa - Abbey from 24th Apr - 26th April 2021

placeInfo/address: Matara Road Kathaluwa, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
text: Amazing place. Beautifully laid out. Staff are super efficient and extremely hospitable. Food was out of this world. Love this awesome beach villa. A must visit. You wouldnt want to leave this place. Loved every minute spent there.
title: Visit to South Point Villa, 21 to 23 Apr 2021. Family of 8.

placeInfo/address: Matara Road Kathaluwa, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
text: The staff was very well organized and the location was beyond amazing! Loved every minute of the stay! The rooms and views were spectacular. The villas were perfect for the group and the food was cooked very well, overall 10/10!

placeInfo/address: Matara Road Kathaluwa, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Honestly you can't go wrong, they are all beach side with a view.
text:
Me and my girlfriend had the pleasure to spend our anniversary here. We have lived in Sri Lanka for 10 months at this point and this was the best place we have ever stayed. 

The staff was extremely friendly and informative and it was the best food we have had here. Their chef has cooked around the world and is very diverse in the way she cooks. The staff took care of us and brought us things before we even knew we needed it.

Not to mention the lovely backyard area connected to the beach. The place is truly perfect for a romantic getaway or a family vibe. As they have many accommodations on the site and 3 pools beach side.  We will never for get this place!!
title: Best Place In South Sri Lanka

placeInfo/address: Matara Road Kathaluwa, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
text: One of the most beautiful villas I have been to. We spent 2 nights here and we enjoyed it so much. Food was great and the staff was also really good. The rooms were spacious and came with a beautiful view. I would 100% recommend this to anyone looking for a holiday down south!
title: South point villa holiday

placeInfo/address: Matara Road Kathaluwa, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
text: The main gate n entrance is by the side of the main road but once you go in to the lobby n out to the pool area you are in a world of your own with the sea refreshingly ahead. The beach is steps away and surprisingly extremely private with some fishing boat movements only. The villa was exceptional, the rooms large n comfy and facilities up to date. The food was great and well prepared. We had everything done by the chef n staff who went out of their way to make us some exquisite dishes n our stay comfortable. Nico ... an adorable doberman kept us company and was a star with all of us and specially the kids. All in all we had a fab time n will return again for another holiday.
title: Fun Family and Friend Getaway

placeInfo/address: Matara Road Kathaluwa, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
text: We wanted to book a villa for the weekend and last minute most of the Villas were book and my friend found this beautiful villa by the beach called the South Point Abbey. As I saw in their website South Point Abbey is a 150 year old renovated Dutch Bungalow which now has turned into a beautiful beach villa. We stayed at the Abbey with 7 of my friends from 12th Dec Sat till 13th Dec sunday 2020 and we had a great time. Definitely one of the best Beach Villas we have stayed and highly recommended. The view of the beach to the balcony and from the pool is superb, the food was very good and tasty and the chef has some good cooking skills. Very clean and the staff who was there to clean and serve were well trained, well disciplined and very helpful. Superb place and because of the service we received and the beauty of the place we stayed in the next door villa which belong to them as well the following weekend with 14 of my friends @ the South Point Ocean Villa. Hoping to visit this beautiful place again soon. Enjoyed every bit of it.
title: Friends Trip to South Point Abbey

placeInfo/address: Matara Road Kathaluwa, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
text: Where do I start! I have absolutely nothing to complain about. The house, the staff the food! Everything exceeded our expectations. Already planning our next trip to this wonderful property. 10/10 would recommend to family, friends
title: Family trip to South Point Ocean

placeInfo/address: Matara Road Kathaluwa, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka

Food was absolutely delicious,two thumbs up for villa chef Manel. Staff are friendly and courteous. Highly recommend and will come back again.
title: Wonderful stay with South Point Abbey
