placeInfo/address: Matara Road Kathaluwa, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
text:
Stayed at South Point Villa the last days of our honeymoon. What an amazing place. Beautiful spacious villa with ( what almost felt like a private ) beach access. We loved spending a couple of days here, we had the feeling we where on a private island! 
A great big thanks to the wonderful staff, they made us feel so at home. 
Make sure to have a lunch and diner out on the veranda prepared by the private chef! We definitely recommend the roti with chicken and prawns and a locale curry!
We one day hope to come back and show this place to others.
title: Amazing location and villa

placeInfo/address: Matara Road Kathaluwa, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
text:
Stayed just 1 day with my family. Thoroughly enjoyed. Great place. Wonderful staff. And an excellent chef who gave us a personal care. Love to visit over and over again. Recommend to visit. Great care guaranteed 

Well done Sonali and the spirited team

Dr. Azyan Shafeek & Family
title: Extraordinary

placeInfo/address: Matara Road Kathaluwa, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
roomTip: villas range  from 3 rooms to 8 rooms to fit any family or group.  Abbey is our favorite but villa might be quietest.  Ocean is biggest.
text:
We have visited Sonali's three villas in Sri-Lanka 10 times.  We have enjoyed the personalized service and incredible location.  The full staff takes care of every need.
The chef cooks to order - we enjoyed seafood, grilled meats and especially the fresh local fruit.  
Our children love going from the swimming pool to the beach and back to the pool.  The views are terrific and the sound of the ocean calming.  It is truly a vacation, we take advantage of long 3 and 4 day weekends to stay at South Pointe.  Sonali always treats us to a cake or massage and sends us away with local tea.
We felt safe even with the local events.  Her driver met us at the airport and dropped us off at the villa.  The water has waves to play in and a sandy beach.
title: Paradise in Sri Lanka

placeInfo/address: Matara Road Kathaluwa, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
text: Wow! What a location. It’s just breathtaking. Absolutely magical. Villa is located on a secluded stretch of the beach. Very private. Very comfortable villa with great staff. Can’t wait to go back. I am in heaven when I am there.
title: Heaven on earth

placeInfo/address: Matara Road Kathaluwa, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
text:

placeInfo/address: Matara Road Kathaluwa, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
text:
FANTASTIC EXPERIENCE

Sonali and her team are fantastic! The villa is beautiful, and all our needs were catered to. Ages on our vacation ranged from 12 – 86, so somewhat challenging; the team took it all in stride and couldn’t have been more helpful. Loved the Sri Lankan traditional food. placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
roomTip: There are some nice excursions available, for example to Galle, a tea plantation and a river cruise.
text: As stated by others, this is a slice of paradise. The beach, the views, the saltwater pool, and  the attention and warmth from Ranjan the manager and his team, is pure bliss. It is more of a private villa (plus two suites), with a high staff to guest ratio, than other boutique hotels. As also said repeatedly by others the food is wonderful, and largely locally sourced. This place is outstanding for rest and recuperation, with ayurwedic massages and treatments available on site. One very important feature is the space and privacy it offers. The lovely garden with a koi water feature and coconut palms must be at least half an acre, right by the beach, which in turn is very quiet. No fighting for sun chairs here! Very difficult to leave…this was my third visit in six years.
title: Privacy and bliss

ownerResponse/text: Very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us! Ranjan and his team were very happy to look after you!
placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
text: We were here for Christmas and had the most magical stay. The hotel is gorgeous, on a beautiful empty beach, and we had the most amazing service from Ranjan and the team. Nothing was too much trouble and we felt like kings and queens for a few heavenly days. Ranjan is the most amazing cook, we were blown away at every meal. (Even the kids loved his food!). We did some great trips from the hotel to a turtle sanctuary and on a river safari, had massages there, swam with turtles on a nearby beach - it was magical. It’s the perfect place to come for a few days of total luxury after a long flight to Colombo.
title: We loved like king and queens for a few heavenly days

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
roomTip: All the views are amazing.
text: Thank you for such a charming and lovely stay! The staff was all so helpful and every meal cooked for us was a delight. The grounds and location were beyond compare for their ability to invite relaxation and reflection. Yoga, massage, and strolls along the beach -- it all added up to a wonderfully relaxing time. Our two-year-old loved the kiddie pool, which was perfect for her age. Max Wadiya, and its trusty manager Ranjan, get everything right. We'll be back.
title: A slice of paradise

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
text:
After spending almost a month in SL we had the opportunity to compare a different types of accommodation / services provided. Without a doubt my family (2x adult, 3x kids: 9, 4 and 1) will vote for Max Wadiya to be a SL champion! 

We came for 7 nights, then extended for another 2 nights and then for another 5 nights.

You have enough privacy, great swimming pool, clean beach with easy access to the sea and a perfectly trained staff that knows what makes your holiday perfect.

RANJAN is the magic word; the word that guarantees if there is any problem, it will be fixed. 

What deserves special attention? Tuk-tuk driver is great (ask Ranjan). Transport from any place (ask Ranjan). You have a healt issue (Ranjan solves it). Fishing, snorkeling or diving, best massage or yoga, any wishes? Ask Ranjan!

Food is more than perfect (wish anything and ask Ranjan). Curry and the salads! OMG!

Small local market on Wednesdays (1 min walk from MW). Fishermans market (early morning): for nine USD (9,00 USD) you get 3 kg barracuda. Hairdresser for less than one USD (1,00 USD) in front of the main entrance to MW. Snorkelling, fishing, diving: ask Ranjan (PADI Hikkaduwa recommended). Changing money (USD or EUR) for SL rupee? Ask Ranjan (best rate, believe me!) 

Finally: personalised, great value, clean property, profesional attitude. Recommended!

PS: Jungle Paradise for safari (ca 2,5 hours by car) perfect spot!

However: Dear Ranjan, I do feel bad. For all the things you did for our family we didn´t appreciate you as we should appreciate you. Sincere apology! I´ll fix it soon!
title: 6star place!

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
text:
Such a lovely place - we extended twice our stay. First planned a week then two then an extra 4 nights. 
So we had a wonderful stay - which was made feeling like home by the whole Max Wadiya team. And thanks to Ranjan it will always be  in our heart…Not to forget Ruth & Arthur giving the stay some special atmosphere having sunset drinks and talks and background infos about the place.
Great and spacious Suite, big pool, sunset dinning and private clean beach with a lot of big waves - what else do you need to relax - yes a private crew helping you through the day and with every wish! We would love keeping this little gem all for our own…
I would also recommend take a TukTuk to go to town or surfing beach Hikkaduwa and a Safari@Udawalawe!
title: Such a Lovely Place and relaxing Stay!

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
text:
The combination of easy access from the airport, the setting on the beach, the gourmet food, comfortable accommodation and the hospitality and graciousness of the staff makes it an unbeatable holiday destination. 

Max Wadiya is so welcoming and has something for all age groups. 

The beach is pristine and almost private; the swimming pool is stunning, the staff conjure up outstanding meals customised to our preferences and serve them in a gazebo with a million-dollar view.

As they say, pictures are worth a thousand words - do take a look!

No wonder this was my seventh visit to Max Wadiya!
title: A Slice of Paradise

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
text: Max Wadiya is a charming and spotlessly clean  boutique hotel where the lovely palm shaded garden leads straight onto the unspoilt beach.  Nothing is too much trouble for the staff.   The food is absolutely delicious and Ranjan makes light as air cake for tea. Heaven - apart from waistline expansion!
title: An oasis

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
text:
Max Wadiya is a dream. 
As soon as you enter the gate, you will find yourself in a warm, welcoming surroundings, with an amazing view, incredible sunsets, a pristine beach and a tropical blue sea.
Ranjan, the manager, is the most kindest man, always thinking two steps ahead of what you might need. And the staff is always there if you need them, but never too present. We loved the food, we enjoyed the trips and spent the best Christmas and New Years Eve ever at Max Wadiya.
We felt like we were all by ourselves, undisturbed by anyone or anything, just living the dream.
Thank you Ruth, Max, Ranjan and the rest of the staff. You really gave us a present we will always remember.
title: Living the dream

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
text: We stayed here for three nights at the end of our Honeymoon to Sri Lanka. The location is only 15 minutes north of Hikkaduwa, but feels like a world away. Although situated along the road, it is very peaceful and we never noticed any noise. The rooms, garden and pool are all fabulous and the beach which is accessible outside was empty apart from a number of local children playing nearby. I would suggest to anyone to stay here if you are looking for a peaceful retreat, but with easy access to nearby town of Hikkaduwa should you wish. Special mention must go to Ranjan and the staff here who couldn't do enough for us. Ranjan even gave me a lift in the rain to nearby Ambalongoda on one occasion so i could get a couple of beers from the shop. Him and his staff really make this place special. We were also lucky enough to release some turtles in to the sea on our first evening. From what I gather, the team here will protect the eggs until they hatch and ensure they are released in a natural and non-intrusive way. Also - we had the same tuk-tuk driver every day who would take us to Hikkaduwa or nearby mask museum - i didn't catch his name but he appeared to be a friend of the hotel and was incredibly friendly and kind. So thanks Ruth, Ranjan and the team for a fabulous last few days in Sri Lanka, we will always remember this place in a special way.
title: Wonderful place in a wonderful location

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
roomTip: We have chosen the blue suite. But I am convinced that every suite in this hotel will provide you a great experience.
text:
This boutique hotel combines modern with colonial style. It is with its wonderful garden andth is large sea water pool like an own island. Large suites with a living area a bed in colonial style and big bathrooms let you feel like in your own house.
The staff is fulfilling every wish before you finished thinking it. Ranshin who is the staff leader and the manager of the property is a great cook and is asking you every day for your special demands. We enjoyed every evening a different dinner and ate on different places (in the garden, on the balcony or in the Villa). Fresh juices, fruits, and vegetables whatever the Sri Lankan kitchen could provide, Ranshin was able to serve it.
We can recommend this place also because it is not in a highly frequented touristic area. Ambalangoda is more surrounded by nice  local people with some other holiday apartments around but close to shops or neighbor-citys if you are looking for offers for tourists like snorkeling, diving or other things.
Max Wadiya has its own beach area whats wonderful and quiet. No beach boys around what was one of the best news we got. Wheather in October was better than in April. The humidity wasn't that high, but some rainy hours we had. Bit I think thats normal for October. Overall it was great wheather and we could enjoy a lot of things in the sun.
We can say it worth every penny we paid and thats why we give this location 5 points.
Thanks for a great time and for the culinary experience.
title: What a great place for a wonderful and romantic holiday

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
text: My family (kids ages 6,10,12) recently traveled from the U.S. to Sri Lanka for 10 days.  Our last 4 days were spent at Max Wadiya.  We had day trips planned but canceled because we could not bring ourselves to leave Max Wadiya, Ranjan (manager) and his team.  The family villa, beach and pool are stunning.  We had the beach to ourselves- so peaceful and beautiful.  My kids loved body surfing the waves.  When the waves became more intense they were off to the pool which is quite large.  We also had the pool to ourselves as no-one else was booked during our stay. :)   I can’t possibly say enough about Ranjan and his team.  Kind, gracious and incredible cooks.  Ranjan happily accommodated my children when they were craving western foods and they loved his cooking.  My husband and I enjoyed the Sri Lankan dishes which were fresh, plentiful, always different and beyond delicious.  The best meals we had on our trip hands down were all at Max Wadiya.  Our kids watched turtles hatch with Ranjan and later helped to release them into the sea at sundown- twice!  Those memories will last a lifetime for them.  Ranjan is so kind, interesting and easy to talk to.  We all miss him!   Last but certainly not least, Ruth Max, the owner, could not have been more helpful when I was planning this trip for my family.  Sri Lanka is the farthest I have traveled with my children to date.  She went above and beyond to help and quickly eased my nerves.  Sri Lanka is a beautiful country with the kindest people (they love kids) and there is SO much to see.  Max Wadiya was the perfect end point to relax on the beach before heading back to the airport.  I only wish we had more than 4 nights there.  Go and let Ranjan and his team spoil you.  The beach is amazing.
title: Amazing Experience With Family

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
text:
Four of us recently spent 5 days enjoying the splendor of the Max Wadiya. The building was exquisitely decorated, the rooms were very attractive and comfortable (and air conditioned!), the staff was always at our beck and call, and the food was out-of-this-world in both taste and presentation!  

Ranjan, the property manager, went above and beyond to arrange a fascinating series of local day trips and local activities for us. His menus were varied, exciting, and food was plentiful.  One of the highlights of our stay was our Sri Lankan cooking lesson with Ranjan. 

It was unseasonably hot during our visit, and we were thrilled to relax in the lovely pool overlooking the sea every day!  

I would very highly recommend the Max Wadiya to visitors in this area!
title: A superb experience!

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
roomTip: all the rooms are fabulous.
text: I spent some wonderful days at Max Wadiya with a small family group.  It was perfect in every way - all the staff were friendly and very helpful; Ranjan, the manager was incredibly warm, caring and capable - and an amazing cook.  We really enjoyed the best of Sri Lankan foods including a cooking lesson and a complimentary collection of spices to take home. My room was so beautiful and comfortable, with a beautiful view and a large balcony overlooking the yard and the sea.  The bathroom facilities and amenities were excellent. The Wadiya property is beautiful boasting a large salt water swimming pool which we hated to leave.  The gardens were lush and the two outdoor gazebos let us eat all our meals al fresco in comfort as we gazed at the sea and listened to the surf. There were dozens of butterflies and birds.  We had fresh fruit drinks whenever we liked.  The manager helped us plan excellent day trips.  The island was pretty hot and humid so if you're very sensitive to that, beware but we managed fine.  The only downside is how long it takes to get there from the States but we broke up our trip on the way there, which I recommend doing.
title: Amazing Max Wadiya

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
text: Max Wadiya is highly recommended! We have stayed there for four days and loved every minute. Beautiful location on the beach, warm hospitality, tasty fresh local food, all amenities provided, and very friendly, attentive service. Truly a memorable vacation!
title: Excellent

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
text:
Our stay at Max Wadiya was a highlight of our visit to Sri Lanka.  From the very start of planning our trip Ruth was very helpful in organizing our stay including pick up from the airport and driver for the remainder of our visit to Sri Lanka.  
Ranjan and his team made us feel as though we owned the place.  They were always keen to be of service and prepared and served the most wonderful meals at our private table in the gardens.  They arranged excursions, gave us a local cooking class, brought us to the beach to witness a green turtle laying her eggs and showed us newly hatched sea turtles  which we were privileged to release at sundown.  

Even though there was another party staying while we were there we felt as though we had the place to ourselves which was a luxury.
title: A luxury holiday

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
text:
Max Wadiya is exceptional. Ran Jan, the manager, is attentive, friendly, professional, very knowledgeable and a great cook. His team took such good care of us. 

Max Wadiya is in the SW corner of Sri Lanka. The Wadiya is an oasis of calm and beauty. I recommend it highly to those who travel this way.
title: Paradise beach

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
text: Quite simply, the best. On an island with no scarcity of luxury hotels, boutique or otherwise, Max Wadiya stands out on so many counts. With accommodation for no more than four sets of guests, the atmosphere is that of a private home rather than a hotel. Bring your own alcohol if you wish, but everything else is included in the price: meals, drinks, service by the pool, on the beach, in your suite or in the garden, wherever and whenever you want it. No irritating chit signing for the smallest indulgence! The large sea water pool is refreshingly cool by Sri Lankan standards; the  beach (effectively private if not officially so) directly borders the garden; meals are served in individual pagodas under the palm trees; the view over the sea at sunset is spectacular; the food is prepared to your own taste by the chef/manager himself, and to a standard unsurpassed in our experience of nine hotels on our twenty-eight day tour of the island; and the friendly and personal service afforded by all the staff is a constant reminder of just how lucky one has been to have discovered Max Wadiya. One drawback to saying how much you love a place: you're encouraging so many others to discover it too!
title: A unique experience

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
text: We spent a happy three nights at Max Wadiya and wished it had been longer.  The Blue Suite had fantastic views out to the lush gardens and beautiful secluded beach.  Ranjan, the Manager and his team were keen to do all that they could to make our stay enjoyable.  The food was delicious and catered to our likes and dislikes, we brought our own gin, but Ranjan sourced tonic water for us, he gave us a cooking class and woke us up in the night to see a green turtle who'd come up the beach to lay her eggs.  The beach is almost deserted, but whilst we were there, it was a bit rough so we contented ourselves with paddling and swam later in the pool.  Thank you for a brilliant stay.
title: What a Location!

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
text:
We stayed at Max Wadiya for 5 days. I wish we could stay longer. What a great vacation place. The staff is so professional, friendly, and accommodating,  willing to grant every wish we posed to them. And the food....OMG!! Can we give it a michelin Star?!
We stayed at the Blue suite. We felt like home- so cozy.
Really had a great time and will cherish the memories forever.  Thank you for pampering us. Hope we can come back and stay again soon.
title: What an amazing piece of heaven!!

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
text: Our seven night stay at Max Wadiya came at the end of our three week trip and was the perfect finale.   From the minute the four of us arrived, we were made to feel completely at home by Ranjan, the manager and his team.   Nothing is too much trouble, but their attention is relaxed and unobtrusive.   Ranjan helped facilitate our tuk tuk adventures to Galle and other local sights, and the masseur who, we all agreed was exceptional.   Every meal, cooked with fresh local produce, was outstanding and as Ranjan got to know our individual preferences, he surpassed himself by coming up with new and delicious dishes each day.   If you get the chance, a cookery lesson with Ranjan is a must.  The accommodation is very comfortable and the salt water pool and garden are an oasis of nature, colour and beauty.   From there a small gate leads you on to the most beautiful, deserted beach, total paradise!  As if that isn't enough, there is a small turtle hatchery on the property, where eggs rescued/bought from the local fishermen, are incubated in the sand until hatched and ready for release.   Ranjan tried to wake us one night to witness a turtle laying her eggs on the beach, but sadly we slept on oblivious.  At least we were able to help with the burial of her eggs the next day.    To me this summed up the whole Max Wadiya experience, the kindness of Ranjan and his team, means you leave a little bit of your heart here.   I completely understand why so many people return - hopefully we will too.
title: MAXimum Praise!

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
roomTip: The guys will look after you there so do ask them to share their local knowledges and experience
text:
Immerse yourself in the experience, it is not just a place to stay -

5. Play games
title: This place has nailed it - don’t stay anywhere else!

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
text:
Best stay in the whole of Sri Lanka. The staff and the food are truely amazing!! Would highly reccomend. 

The beach is very nice and chill, overall great experience.
title: Whiskey point

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Book your vacation and go as soon as possible. Dont wait another day 😅
text:
A paradise of a place, but the real beauty are the people running the resort.  The team around mufa and murthala are top of the top, always supportive with a smile in their face. It feels like being with friends and family who only want the best for you in every moment. They literally helped us with everything and made our stay as unique as it could have been. Thank you so much!!

Also the cabins and the original italian cuisine are absolutely stunning. Direct ocean access as well adds just another top experience.
title: Best place

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Het is een paradijs dus neem je tijd en GENIET!
text: Wat een geweldige ervaring! Cabana’s gelegen in een ‘park’ met palmbomen aan t strand. Uitzonderlijk lief en attent personeel, heerlijk eten (pizza’s yammie) en ook nog speciaal een kampvuur op het strand met diner. Hoe mooi kan je het krijgen!
title: Niet te missen ervaring dit hotel!!

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
text: I have traveled to Sri Lanka twice and this is the best resort I have been to. The quality of the food and fruit is 10/10. Very clean, amazing employees and the ocean views are fantastic. I was there for one day but it is a place I could stay at for a week. Would come again!
title: 10/10 Resort

ownerResponse/text:
Dear ,

Thank you for sharing your experience. We’re delighted that you enjoyed our friendly staff, cozy beachfront location, and the amazing Kumana safari we organized for you. Providing a smooth arrival with a taxi from Colombo Airport and early check-in at 2-3 AM was our pleasure.

We’d like to clarify that while we allowed an early check-in as a courtesy,a complimentary night, this did not include a complimentary Breackfast. Upon arrival, we informed you that breakfast for that night was not included, as we had already arranged a free Kumana park booking and assisted with your taxi reservation.

Regarding the food selection, please note that we do not advertise ourselves as an Asian restaurant. We are an Italian restaurant and pizzeria, and this is clearly mentioned in our menu, website, and reviews. While we do offer some local flavors, our focus remains on authentic Italian cuisine.

As for the hot water, we appreciate your understanding. As an eco-friendly resort, we aim to respect nature and resources. While most guests find it unnecessary in our warm climate, we are evaluating options to introduce hot water in the future.

We regret any miscommunication regarding breakfast details and will ensure even more clarity in the future. However, we’re happy to hear that your overall stay was great and that you would recommend our resort for a beachfront getaway with easy access to Kumana park.

We hope to welcome you again soon!

Best regards,
Nicola
Whisky Point Resort
placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
roomTip: If you want to sleep past 6 AM, bring an eye pad.
text: Cozy place to stay by the beach. Good food in the restaurant. Friendly staff that helped us to book a taxi from Colombo Airport to the hotel, an amazing safari to Kumana park and our way out to Badulla, where we took a train to Kandy. In general, everyone in the staff was very friendly and helpful. On the bad side, no hot water (they said they intend to install in the near future) and the manager told us one thing about the breakfast and later, another thing. I paid, no problem, as overall, they were generous to us, but when you say something to a costumer, you should stick to it. If you cannot offer something, better be honest about it from the beginning.
title: Friendly staff near Kumana park

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
text:
Unser Aufenthalt in diesem Resort war einfach fantastisch! Das Essen war köstlich, frisch zubereitet, abwechslungsreich und den Preis wert. Dazu kommt das überaus freundliche und herzliche Personal, das immer ein Lächeln auf den Lippen hatte und uns jeden Wunsch erfüllt hat.

Die Zimmer sind geräumig und sauber. Die gesamte Anlage ist sehr gepflegt und liegt direkt am wunderschönen Strand – einfach perfekt! Besonders toll: Es ist ruhig und nicht von Touristen überlaufen, ein echter Geheimtipp für alle, die entspannen möchten.

Die traumhaften Anlage bietet viele tolle Angebote: Surfstunden, Yogaübungen, gratis WLAN, kostenloser Wäscheservice und verschiedene Spiele wie 4 Gewinnt oder Beachball. Ein weiteres Highlight war der Filmabend sowie das gemütliche Lagerfeuer am Strand. Zudem gibt es immer kostenloses Trinkwasser – ein super Service!

Alles in allem ein perfekter Ort für einen entspannten und unvergesslichen Urlaub. Wir kommen definitiv wieder!
title: ★★★★★ Perfekter Ort zum Entspannen!

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
text: We had the best time at Whisky Point! We stayed two nights and wish we’d doubled it. Our boys spent all their time battling the (life guarded!) waves while our daughter charmed the dogs and cat on the property. We journeyed out for surfing, but chose to eat pizza meal after meal because it is THAT good.
title: Don’t miss Whisky Point!

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
text:
We had an absolutely amazing stay at Whisky Point Resort, and we wholeheartedly recommend it to everyone!! A special shoutout to Mufaris and Murthala for their outstanding and precise service—they went above and beyond to make our experience unforgettable.

The highlight of our stay was the incredible food and drinks. The iced tea was the best we’ve ever tasted, and the pizza was absolutely divine! Every bite and sip transported us to a place of pure bliss.

Whisky Point Resort truly feels like a little paradise nestled within an already paradise-like island. The serene ambiance, combined with the warmth and hospitality of the staff, makes this a must-visit destination. Thank you for such an unforgettable experience. We’ll be back for sure!
title: Paradise

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
text:
Serene beachfront getaway perfect for surfers and travelers seeking relaxation. The resort offers eco-friendly accommodations like cabanas and pagodas, blending comfort with nature. We appreciated the exceptional service, vibrant yet tranquil atmosphere, and proximity to surf spots. On-site activities include yoga, Thai massages, and surf lessons. The Italian-inspired restaurant serves delicious meals, complemented by stunning ocean views.
Thank You Nicola and Anna to make our stay memorable.
title: Perfect blend between natural simplicity and comfort

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
text:
Nous avons passé un super séjour au Whisky Point Resort, l’endroit est magique, en bord de mer, le staff est adorable, les cabanes sont tops et hyper confortables, 
Nous avons très bien mangés, tous les plats que nous avons goûtés à la carte étaient bons.
title: Stop à Arugam Bay

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
text:
Маленький рай, эстетика в мелочах.
Очень тихое красивое место. Территория очень ухоженная. Продумано все до мелочей. 
Персонал очень отзывчивый и вежливый. 
Хорошая кухня. 
Очень удобный матрас и подушки.

Рядом с территорией отеля вы можете увидеть слонов. 

Нам не хотелось уезжать, обязательно вернемся в этот рай на земле🙏🏻Спасибо персоналу🤍Нам очень понравилось в Whisky point resert.
title: Рай на Земле

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
text: This is a really magical place. It's the rare opportunity to actually sleep in a cabana in a safe environment on a secluded beach. You fall asleep and wake up hearing the sea. The staff are so kind and fun, you can chill out in the sun and have beers and food brought to you, or you can go surfing, go on safari or visit arugum bay easily by tuk tuk, knowing you are coming home to a peaceful piece of heaven. The food is really good, the service is top quality and it kind of seems like nothing is a problem, everyone is very chilled out and this helps you to do the same. Bring a book and enjoy some rare peace while you relax here
title: The most peaceful place

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
text: מקום מדהים! היחס של הצוות מהמם. המקום עצמו מבודד ושקט, ועם זאת לא רחוק בכלל מארוגם עצמה. אווירה שקטה ונעימה, מרגיש כמו אי פרטי ומבודד. חוף יפייפה, חדרים כיפים, אמנם בלי מזגן ואין מים חמים, אבל זה לגמרי בסדר. ממליצה בחום אנה וניקולה מאוד אכפתיים ונותנים יחס ושירות ברמה מאוד גבוהה.
title: המלצה חמה על הריזורט

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
text:
WOW - Was für ein paradiesischer Ort! Wir haben uns in dieses Resort verliebt. Vom Zimmer bis hin zum Service und der Betreuung vor Ort, alles war ein Traum. Mit dem TukTuk ist man innert 15-20 Minuten in Arugam Bay, geniesst aber zeitgleich die Abgeschiedenheit dieses traumhaften Strandes. Das Personal ist aussergewöhnlich und extrem freundlich. Die Owner Nikola und Anna sind die besten Gastgeber und wissen, was Gäste suchen und wünschen. Wir bedanken uns ganz herzlich für diesen tollen Aufenthalt und kommen bestimmt wieder!!!

Unglaublich schön gemachte Cabanas. Teilweise offene Wände und dadurch mitten in der Natur - einfach traumhaft. Wir haben uns hier extrem wohlgefühlt! Es ist immer jemand da, in der Nacht gibt es einen Nachtwächter. Wir haben uns zu keiner Zeit Sorgen gemacht, auch nicht zu unseren Wertsachen.

Unglaublich leckeres Essen! Hervorragendes Frühstück und tolle Getränke, ausserdem gibt es leckeres italienisches Essen da der Owner Nikola italienische Wurzeln hat. Burrata mitten am Strand - geht's noch besser?
title: Einfach nur WOW

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
text:
From the minute you check-in, you know you have arrived at a very special place. 
If you are looking for the hustle & bustle of Arugam or similar, this is unfortunately not for you.  However, if you are looking for a wonderful escape with beautiful scenery & tranquillity, you are in luck. 
The rooms are exceptionally clean & beautifully but simply decorated with everything you need. Service is always prompt &  delivered with a smile. Food is incredible. 
Anna is a fantastic yoga teacher and the skills she has taught me, I'll cherish for years to come. 
Every team member is a wonderful addition to the family and makes it totally unforgettable! 
Thanks for an amazing 2 week stay in your little paradise.
title: Little piece of paradise

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
text:
Luogo Magico
Sono stata a whisky point ad agosto  per la seconda volta di fila .mi trovavo in vacanza con amiche e sono stati dieci giorni incredibili. Whisky si trova poco distante da Arugambay e ti permette di stare sereno e rilassato in un posto paradisiaco senza il caos del centro. Le mie amiche stavano comodamente sdraiate nelle cabane , in riva al mare , prendendo il sole mentre io potevo andare a piedi a surfare allo spot di Pottuvil.
La colazione e in generale il servizio di ristorazione di altissimo livello il tutto condido dalla gentilezza dello staff.
Il titolare del Resort insieme alla sua compagna sono stati davvero splendidi!
Assolutamente consigliatissimo!
title: Magic Place

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
text: The resort is great , Anna and Nicola super hosts that were attentive and caring, assisting me when I felt ill one day with all great medical attention. The kids loved everything, food was so good and could just walk to the beach for surfing. Also took a ioga session with Anna that was great. Highly recommend 🩵
title: Great resort, waves food and hospitality

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
text: I stayed with a friend for a couple of days and then solo and I couldn't ask for a better accommodation for that time! The place is so lovely, charming, clean and just perfect to enjoy a cosy vacation. It's right next to the ocean, you can hear the waves when you lay in bed, hammocks and beach lounges to chill, perfect service, etc. so you can just have a relaxing time. Did some yoga with Anna, which was amazing and very sweet, having chats about our lives - both Nicolette and Anna are just angels and so welcoming + staff is super nice and helpful as well. An honest thank you for those amazing days with you!
title: Beautiful place with a big heart

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
text: Cosa c’è di meglio di mangiare una pizza come in Italia anche la pasta è ottima caffè buonissimo e soprattutto atmosfera incredibile! Super consigliato posto allegro e servizio e pulizia ottima!! Siamo stati bene e felici super consigliato
title: Esperienza ottima

placeInfo/address: Temple Road, Beliatta 82200 Sri Lanka
text: As the Karusan Travels team, we highly recommend Maya Tangalle for anyone seeking a truly memorable getaway. From the warm and friendly welcome to the exceptional service provided by their amazing staff, every moment was top-notch. The food was absolutely delicious, and the luxury rooms offered both comfort and elegance. A perfect blend of relaxation and excellence – thank you to the entire Maya Tangalle team for a wonderful experience!
title: Exceptional Stay at Maya Tangalle – Highly Recommended!

placeInfo/address: Temple Road, Beliatta 82200 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Laat je verwennen in deze oase.
text:
Van aankomst tot vertrek was een topervaring. De ontvangst was hartelijk en persoonlijk. Het personeel, de tuin, het huis, de kamers en het eten zijn uniek en exclusief. Het zwembad heeft lekker warm water en er zijn goede bedden en stoelen.

Op verzoek werd gekookt wat je maar wilt. En dat op het hoogste niveau! Wij kozen steeds voor Aziatisch. Het was een waanzinnige culinaire ervaring. 

We hadden een avond met live muziek, speciaal voor ons geregeld, omdat het oud en nieuw was. Het diner was buiten aan het speciaal verlichte zwembad. 

Het personeel doet alles om het je naar de zin te maken. Het was echt onvergetelijk.
title: Hospitality pur sang

placeInfo/address: Temple Road, Beliatta 82200 Sri Lanka
roomTip: You can travel to many local destinations from here but the hotel offers a number of experiences including trips to the beach
text: Simply stunning, faultless! I don't think we've ever stayed in such a charismatic property. Architecturally influenced by Geoffrey Bawa, responsible for so many notable Sri Lankan properties, Maya Tangalle stands apart from so many heritage properties by its attention to detail, level of finish and decor and the overwhelmingly helpful and courteous staff.  Set in fifty acres, most of which is its own paddy fields that stretch beyond the manicured garden of two acres or so, Go here if you want to be pampered from start to finish. An outstanding chef capped our stay with lovely creations. We stayed in one of the main house bedrooms, complete with a mini staircase to get into bed! A real experience.
title: Simply stunning

placeInfo/address: Temple Road, Beliatta 82200 Sri Lanka
text: Absolutely stunning location, designed to be relaxed every minute. Rooms confortable, awesome cooking, and an impeccable service. Like other guests said before: make sure to stay as long as possible to enjoy all It has to offer. Would repeat without hesitation
title: Absolute perfection

placeInfo/address: Temple Road, Beliatta 82200 Sri Lanka
text: Our stay at Maya Tangalle was truly relaxing. The serene environment and attentive staff made us feel at home. The Ayurvedic program, starting with a personalized consultation, included daily yoga sessions and rejuvenating treatments like body detox massages. The wellness meals were both healthy and delicious. We left feeling refreshed and grateful for the experience.
title: Wonderful experience in Maya Tangalle!

placeInfo/address: Temple Road, Beliatta 82200 Sri Lanka
text:
We had the most magical and peaceful stay at Maya Tangalle. Every detail of the hotel was beautifully curated, but what truly made our experience exceptional was the seamless organisation and attention to every need. From the fantastic meals to the flawless coordination of day trips and logistics, everything was handled with care and efficiency.  

A heartfelt thank you to Prashath and his meticulous team, whose professionalism, kindness, and dedication ensured that every aspect of our stay was perfect and tailored to our preferences. Prashath is an outstanding manager, and his team members were equally wonderful.
title: Beautiful stay, amazing staff

placeInfo/address: Temple Road, Beliatta 82200 Sri Lanka
text:
Fantastic! 
We first came as a couple 11 years ago and returned this year with our three children. We still have the same feeling of being in a true haven of peace. The architecture is beautiful, the decoration is both traditional and charming. The garden is stunning and bordered by magnificent rice fields.
The location is perfect for exploring the region. The staff is extremely professional and helpful. Everything is done with great care and generosity. 
Although we would like to keep this secret for ourselves, we can only recommend this amazing place!
title: Truly amazing

placeInfo/address: Temple Road, Beliatta 82200 Sri Lanka
text:
The Maya Tangalle is a hidden gem in the south of Sri Lanka. Nestled in a green oasis, it offers the perfect retreat for those seeking peace. At the same time, it is a logistically ideal starting point to explore the beauties of this impressive island, Sri Lanka, and is surrounded by many attractive and interesting highlights. The journey to the sea is also very short (15 minutes), and you can be taken to a beautiful beach by the Maya team at any time upon request.
The “Maya” offers accommodation of the highest standard with its 5 beautiful rooms. The rooms are perfectly equipped, and the large beds allow for heavenly sleep. The entire property is in top condition and is lovingly tended daily by the Maya team.
Culinary service at the “Maya” is provided at the highest level, allowing you to enjoy everything from traditional and typical local dishes to any international cuisine style. The highly developed degree and extraordinary willingness and flexibility of the kitchen team to personalize made my Ayurveda stay a special experience.
The entire “Maya” team is passionate about making the guest happy and satisfied. Every wish is practically read from the guest's eyes, and as a guest, you are unobtrusively the center of attention in every aspect. Whether in the resort or outside on trips and excursions, the team is always there, very helpful, competent, and above all, very friendly.
Special mention should be made of the many massages and Ayurveda treatments that I enjoyed every day. Nadee masters all therapies and treatments perfectly, and for me, these were the best massages of my life.
All in all, Maya is a perfect combination of location, architecture, luxurious facilities, high-level service, and cuisine, and it impresses above all with the friendliness and competence of the team. A true insider tip – I will definitely come back.
title: A Paradise

placeInfo/address: Temple Road, Beliatta 82200 Sri Lanka
text: Wonderful..  repeat WONDERFUL establishment. We gave been to multiple 5 star hotels and yet have NEVER experienced anything like this. The level of service is not seen anymore in this age. I literally cannot put this into words. If you are looking for romantic luxury, a decadent unwinding, a complete and holistic pampering then you NEED to stay here. My wife has never been so happy with anything else I have surprised her with. Thank you, thank you, thank you for this absolutely 5 star treatment you gave us.
title: There are no words to describe such a wonderful retreat

placeInfo/address: Temple Road, Beliatta 82200 Sri Lanka
text:
My stay at Maya Tangalle was nothing short of perfection! This super luxury boutique hotel exceeded all expectations with its blend of elegance, exceptional service, and serene atmosphere. Each unit is assigned its own butler, and I was fortunate to have Mr. Prashanth and Mr. Sampath, who provided truly unbelievable service, attending to every detail with warmth and professionalism.

The hotel offers its own shuttle service, making it incredibly easy to explore the beautiful surroundings, including a private beach, the Mulkirigala Temple, and nearby waterfalls. The food was outstanding, with no rigid time frames, allowing us to dine and swim at our own pace. There’s also an on-site spa offering relaxing treatments, which added to the luxury experience.  

Maya Tangalle is the perfect place to unwind and recharge. highly recommend it for anyone looking for a luxury escape!
title: Unforgettable Luxury Experience at Maya Tangalle

If you’re looking for a serene escape to unwind in nature, Maya Tangalle is an absolute must-visit.

ownerResponse/text:
Dear S-Himakara,
Thank you so much for taking the time to share such a detailed and glowing review of your stay at Maya Tangalle! We are absolutely delighted to hear that your visit exceeded expectations and that our blend of British and Dutch influences, combined with the natural beauty surrounding the property, made for a serene and luxurious retreat during your official trip.
We take great pride in our connection to nature, and it’s wonderful to know that the peaceful mornings and open spaces left a lasting impression on you. Your kind words about our staff's attention to detail, the cleanliness of the rooms, and the outstanding food are truly appreciated. Our team, including myself and our Executive Chef, strives to go above and beyond to ensure our guests have an unforgettable experience, and your compliments will certainly be shared with them.
While we understand that our location is a little distance from the beach, we’re pleased that you found the nearby attractions, like Hiriketiya Beach and the national parks, to be worthwhile additions to your stay. The balance between beach fun and our tranquil setting is something we aim to offer, and it’s heartwarming to hear that you enjoyed both.
We would be honored to welcome you back to Maya Tangalle on your next trip to Sri Lanka. Thank you again for choosing to stay with us and for highlighting what made your experience so special.
Warm regards,
Prashanth
Manager, Maya Tangalle
placeInfo/address: Temple Road, Beliatta 82200 Sri Lanka
text:
Our visit to Maya Tangalle during a short official trip was a delightful surprise. This stunning place, with its British and Dutch influences, is beautifully restored and offers a real sense of luxury.

What really makes Maya Tangalle stand out is its connection to nature, with open spaces and views of the surrounding paddy fields.

Mornings at Maya are incredibly peaceful, like a calm start to the day. The staff attention to detail is impressive, and their genuine smiles make the stay even more enjoyable.

The property itself is simply divine, with stunning views and a well maintained, charming rural setting. The food was outstanding.

Though it’s bit away from the beach, it’s only a 20 minute drive to  Hiriketiya Beach, one of the best in the south for swimming and surfing, with plenty of restaurants to relax at afterwards. It is the perfect mix of beach fun and returning to comfort.

Maya Tangalle is in a clam and tranquil area, perfect for unwinding . The rooms were spotless and very comfortable, and the staff were amazing friendly, experienced and always willing to go the extra mile. 

One small downside is the distance from the beach, but the nearby attractions make up for it. Yala and Udawalawe National Parks are just two hours away, offering an incredible wildlife experience.

Special thanks to Prashan, the property manager , the executive chef and the entire team for their outstanding hospitality.
title: Maya Tangalle ; a serene luxury retreat amidst nature!

placeInfo/address: Temple Road, Beliatta 82200 Sri Lanka
text:
Maya Tangalle was a decadent and luxurious escape from the city. The friendly staff are quick to greet you with smiles and efficient hospitality. The rooms and en suite bathrooms were spacious and large with beautiful accessories. 
The large pool was delightful and the warm water just washed your stress away. It was a quiet and unobtrusive ambience that helps one relax completely. 
The food served was absolutely delicious; perhaps the best I have experienced in resort hotels in Sri Lanka.  Not just the taste, but the presentation and the service was impeccable. We were served "fried ice cream " for dessert- an original crunchy batter encasing vanilla ice cream that tantalised the taste buds. It was served in a decadent and pristine dining room that resembled royalty.
An incredible hotel for a luxurious and peaceful holiday, Maya Tangalle should be your next holiday destination.
title: Luxuriously peaceful getaway

roomTip: Excellent Local Excursion
text:
My wife and I stayed here for 3 nights as part of our 3 week long honeymoon to Sri Lanka. I have to say it's my second visit to maya probably the highlight of our trip.

What is unique about this villa ‘complex’ is that it is completely open to the elements and the paddy around it.

Our Kind Deluxe room was amazing. It felt luxurious, clean and had everything you needed. Given nature was on the doorstep, there were no unwanted guests in our room at any time.

The real highlight of the manor are its staff, in particular our assigned  Prashath manager.
Other thanks goes to the guest experience officer Chathuka. He made us feel very welcome from the moment we arrived and he couldn’t do enough for us during our stay.

Overall, a hugely awarding and positive stay at Maya Tangalle, and we would return again in the future.
title: Awarding stay at Maya Tangalle

Nach den warmen Tagen an der Ostküste war es ein herrlicher Kontrast, hier die kühlen Temperaturen und die einzigartige Atmosphäre der Highlands zu genießen. Alles ist bequem erreichbar, sei es ein Spaziergang am Gregory Lake, der Victoria Park oder eine Teeplantage in der Nähe.

Das Hotel selbst ist stilvoll eingerichtet und passt wunderbar zur Umgebung. Wer Ruhe, Natur und eine besondere Stimmung sucht, ist hier genau richtig. Wir wären gerne noch länger geblieben.

placeInfo/address: No. 55 Upper Lake Rd, Nuwara Eliya 22200 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Better to go for highest category rooms
text:
W15 Lake Gregory is a charming property with modern amenities that make it a pleasant place to unwind in Nuwara Eliya. The rooms are clean and cozy, though smaller than expected. Heaters in the rooms were a welcome feature, but they didn’t always function properly, which was a bit disappointing given the cold climate.

The heated swimming pool was one of the main attractions, but unfortunately, the pool heaters weren’t working properly during our stay. This made it difficult to fully enjoy the pool, especially in the chilly weather.

The food, on the other hand, was excellent—flavorful and well-presented, easily one of the highlights of the stay. Service overall was good, although the initial welcome lacked the warmth and hospitality usually experienced at similar resorts. That said, the staff were polite and accommodating throughout the visit.

As for the views, while the surroundings are peaceful, they didn’t quite live up to the picturesque scenes described in the property’s promotions.

In summary, W15 Lake Gregory offers a comfortable stay with delicious food and decent service, but there’s room for improvement in terms of heating, hospitality, and delivering on scenic expectations.
title: W15

We stayed at W15 Nuwara Eliya during our Sri Lanka trip, and it was such a memorable experience. The property is located right by Lake Gregory, with a beautiful shortcut path that leads straight to the lake—such a peaceful and picturesque spot!

The villa itself is stunning, with charming British architecture that makes you feel like you've stepped into a different era. From the moment we arrived, we loved the vibe of the place. The rooms, the ambience, everything was just perfect.

We were lucky to be there during the Tamil-Sinhalese New Year, and the staff had arranged an entire celebration. From traditional snacks to fun local games, they made us feel like a part of the festivities, not just guests.

Special thanks to the amazing team—Lakishan, Kieshan, Mr. Raj, Mr. Jim, and Chef Mono—you all made our stay so special. Super polite, warm, and helpful throughout. The dinner and breakfast were both brilliant too!

text:
We choose Thaala Bentota as out last resort to a week holiday in Srilanka.
The resort is a lush green, vibrant and spacious with facilities like pool, spa and gym along with beach accessible at all the times.
Rooms are beach facing, cozy, clean and with basic amenities 
Food at chatters is good but the taste of buffet was not up to the mark. The food actually caters to guest from Europe in taste and spices so me being Asian missed the spice and salt. 
The non vegetarian options are more than the vegetarian ones. I could not find srilankan delicacy other than hopper. The sambal spread is good though.
title: A beach getaway for the lazy vacation

The hotel opens to a breach front which is open to public but is well maintained. The hotel has enough green space for kids to run around and play. I would definitely plan a stay at Thaala Bentota again.
title: Amazing place to stay with family

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
text:
Posto bellissimo servizio ottimo cibo buonissimo!! Siamo venuti qui più volte da quanto abbiamo mangiato bene! 
Pizza come in Italia, pasta al pomodoro consigliata per non parlare del caffè fatto con la moka cosa si può chiedere di meglio!!!
title: Esperienza eccezionale

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Alles top top behalve de bediening van het eten duurt eindeloos lang, goed op voorhand bestellen je hebt minstens nog een 45 minuten/een uur
text: Prachtige en ruime accommodatie. Mooie tuin aan het strand gelegen. Drie cabana’s gelijkvloers/eerste verdiep met privé badkamer en 5 cabana’s met gedeelde badkamer. Super bediening en eigenaar is Italiaan spreekt verschillende talen. Vrij luxueus ondanks basic concept.
title: Mooie accomodatie

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
text: We recently stayed at Whiskey Point Resort for two weeks and loved our time there!!! Falling asleep to the beautiful ocean breaking against the shore, clean and comfortable rooms, and amazing food and service everyday. Ana, Hari, Moufa, and all the staff answered all our questions and were so thoughtful and caring throughout our stay. Loved our time here and highly recommend Whiskey Point Resort 💛
title: Amazing stay

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
text:
Con la mia ragazza abbiamo trascorso 3 notti al Whisky Point Resort e ci siamo trovati splendidamente.

La location è spettacolare, il resort è molto accogliente e sia le camere che li spazi comuni sono curatissimi .

La cucina è ottima e la pizza merita davvero sia per la scelta degli ingredienti che della preparazione.

Un grazie speciale ad Anna, i ragazzi del resort e della surf school che ci hanno accolti splendidamente, con gentilezza ed incredibile professionalità facendoci sentire a casa.

Un luogo dove tornare assolutamente 

Alessia e Joseph
title: Soggiorno indimenticabile

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
text: I stayed at the hotel for 10 days, the hotel is lovely, very well-kept and really clean, the owners Nicolette and Anna are charming and kind, the staff is amazing!! Especially Mupa the King! I really enjoyed sitting and talking with him and hearing about his life, he served us with kindness and niceness and always with a smile, he is a really charming guy!
title: Amazing place with amazing staff

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Get an upper cabana
text:
Whisky resort is utterly beautiful..this somewhat remote ,peaceful utterly gorgeous spot.  Where you can't stop taking photos! 

We stayed for 10 nights which we was longer than most, probably people visit for a few days which probably would be best. 

We took a long taxi to get here fome colombo! Took us 8 hours. Arranged by the resort which was very helpful and efficient. 

The cabanas - we took a risk with no air con as the fans and sea breeze we thought would be sufficient, unfortunately it was sweltering hot.  We had a lower cabana which doesn't have ceiling fans but has the standing fans...it was so so hot that sleep was difficult.. this heat is nothing the resort can do about of course and I understand and agree with the owner that air con isn't good for the planet ..so I totally get it. But its important to note how hot we felt in case this will be an issue for you..it was for us and did affect our enjoyment.  I ended up with a heat rash half way through the holiday!:( 

This said Anna was SO accommodating and moved us to an upper cabana when they were free, she did this without charge and we definitely felt cooler in an upper cabana as they have ceiling fans and higher ceilings.. so I'd recommend if going when hot to book an upper cabana..plus the view is nicer and feels more private. 

They also gave us an extra fan to help. 

The cabanas are comfy though, beds were nice comfy pillows, kept very clean and a nice bathroom:)

The beach is completely deserted, so our walks were usually just us..in paradise.  Important to add..the waves in the sea, it is a surf point of course, are powerful so you can't swim or float..you can jump about in the waves which is fun just is quite tiring ha ha as you can't relax as such. ;) 

It's great breakfast is included and it's tasty..the menu is mainly Italian and its OK, some of the dishes are a little strange in flavour and personally I didn't think all worked and we really really would have loved more local food.  We had sri lankan curry one night and it was fantastic! But then the chef didn't want to cook it again:( I think this is a real shame..as its lots of pizza and pasta.  The pizzas are amazing though ..the best pizza I've ever tasted.  But we were dissapointed we only got sri lankan food once at thw resort.  But I guess for those travelling around Sri Lanka it's a lovely great If they've only been eating sri lankan.

The staff are incredible here...Harry and the other man who worked in the evening with him plus the man who cleaned the rooms..everyone was so kind, so polite, such helpful joyful people and we absolutely loved their company and help.  They work really hard and can't do enough for you. 

Harry you're wonderful! 

Nicola the owner is great, really interesting to talk to, helpful and a real passion for the paradise he's created.  Anna is also very very helpful and kind..and runs lovely yoga classes.  I'd add that I wish we'd been told about the mediation schedule when we arrived as we would have joined every morning but didn't get shown it until 3 days before we left.  More mediation would be wonderful.:)

Overall this place is paradise..I loved it..but the lack of air con was a real challenge for us BUT we did know there was none so  there's no fault of the resort..just wanted to forewarn others if going when it's hot. 

Definitely go if you're visiting sri lanka !! It's like a retreat..just go, get under the coconut palms, listen to the waves and birds.  

Thanks to the whole team for being amazing
title: It's beautiful 😍

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
text: We spend 3 nights in an upper cabana - room was very comfortable- we left the doors & shutters open at night & slept to the roar of the waves & the breeze off the palm trees - what a great way to sleep. Breakfast was very good - the wood fired pizzas were amazing ! The water in the ocean was too rough for swimming when we were there in March . All the staff were very friendly & helpful - shout out to Harry ! We did the Lagoon Safari late one afternoon - recommend this . All in all a very peaceful place to stay
title: Great Barefoot in the Sand Stay

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
text:
Just amazing would summarize it best!
Anna and the Whisky Point Team Mufaris, Colvin and many more warmly welcomed us and made our stay relaxed, joyful and absolutly worth it.
We stayed a few days in a lovely upper cabana, which has been furnished with an eye for an detail and enjoyed good sleep with the sound of the sea.
The team was just stunning! They recommended and helped with trips, offered awesome Italian Food (Special for Sri Lanka) and helped even when sunburn was an issue :)
Just book your stay and enjoy the resort!
title: Awesome Team, Food and Resort!

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
text: We had a wonderful time - Yoga in the morning, very friendly and helpful staff, great setting, good food. The rooms are clean and nicely decorated, the beds are very good. We were there off-season and had the whole place to ourselves. A real treat!
title: Great and quiet place off-season

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
text: Un petit paradis. Tout est absolument parfait ! Le lieu, les plats, l’accueil, les cabanes sur pilotis face à la plage où lire et rêver, tout en dégustant des délices. Une réelle sérénité dans un décor idyllique. On aimerait rester là des semaines entières !
title: Paradisiaque

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
text:
We spent 3 nights at Whisky Point Resort. It was the most relaxing part of our holiday in Sri Lanka.  Anna was an amazing host, she and her team gave us a warm welcome, helped us settle in and we had the most wonderful 3 days.  The cabanas are tastefully decorated with attention to detail, high quality linens, and utmost consideration to make it very Eco friendly. The rooms and entire property were extremely clean. The breakfast was good and we had our meals on the property which were delicious. The pizzas were great.
The pagodas scattered throughout the property are great and we enjoyed relaxing in them. The entire team were courteous and did an excellent job. 
We did a trip to the Kumana Park, Anna recommended a beautiful nature area where we spent an evening spotting allegators, elephants and beautiful birds. The beach is pristine and we had it to ourselves. We walked endless miles soaking in the beauty and watch the fishermen pulling their nets in with their catch of fish. A stay at this resort is a great option on a vacation to Sri Lanka.  Keep up the great work Anna and Team. Transportation to and from was arranged by the resort and we were very happy with the arrangements.
title: A True Gem off the Beaten Path

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
text:
Really lovely stay, beautiful rooms that are well equipped and also decorated beautifully.
The staff are incredible, very friendly and very helpful! 
The food is delicious, did not expect to get such good Italian food on the beach in Sri Lanka, but obviously use high quality ingredients - pizza also very good made in traditional pizza over!
title: Excellent stay, friendly staff and great food!

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
text: Absolutely lovely place. Apparently we were there 'out of season' (whatever that means?) which suited us perfectly. We had almost the entire beach to ourselves. Fantastic room and brilliant service. The staff were a joy to be with. Mufiah, Harry, and Colvin get particular mention, but everyone contributed to the feelgood, well managed, well looked after, feeling. The food was outstanding, especially the "Sri Lanka" option! We loved the lagoon visit, the game park (1 1/2 leopard spotted), etc etc
title: Relaxing and beautiful with great service

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Go out early in the morning to watch the sunrise over the sea! So pretty.
text: Absolutely lovely view! The food was AMAZING, pizza’s 10/10. The staff were ever so lovely, and the Mama’s Coconut was just mmmm!!! The beach hideouts were so comfy and private, and the service was very easy and the rooms were ever so nice! Could do with a bit more air-con, but other than that absolutely no complaints!
title: AMAZING!

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
text: Unforgettable experience! From the very beginning, a warm welcome, a staff full of professionalism, especially Anna, who took care of us wholeheartedly. We received a complimentary room upgrade and were amazed by the food, location, and views. Even for non-surfers, it's a magical place. Highly recommended!
title: Unforgettable experience!

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
text: We had an amazing time at Whisky Point Resort! We had a Deluxe Beach Hut with a nice Balcony, Bathroom and Big Bed with a Fan. The Service of Colvin and Mufaris ' Team was absolutely Outstanding and Perfect. You can order your Breakfast to your Room which is amazing, drinking Water is for free.We definitely recommend going there, it’s such a calm and beautiful place to relax and forget your sorrows :-) Thankyou!
title: Fabulous !

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
roomTip:
Kostenloser Waschservice
Parkplätze
text:
Die Unterkunft war bisher die beste die wir hatten. Die Lage ist etwas außerhalb, was die Unterkunft sehr ruhig macht. Die Zimmer sind sauber und werden täglich gereinigt. 

Die Gastgeber sind mehr als freundlich und hilfsbereit. Mamas coconut und die milchshakes sind der Hammer! 

Wer auch nach etwas zu Essen sucht ist hier richtig aufgehoben. Die Pizzen aus dem Holzofen entsprechen einer Pizza Napoletana (vermutlich weil der Besitzer aus Italien kommt)
title: Beste Wahl

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
text: Excellent, comfy cabanas right on the ocean in a beautiful part of the coastline. Outside the bustle of A Bay but an easy tuk tuk ride in when you feel like it. Staff are absutely lovely, and help you organize anything needed, whether that's surf gear, car/tuk tuks, location advice or whatever you ask! They also have beautiful sun bed huts right on the beach, to which they'll bring you anything you feel like from the on-site bar/restaurant (which has lovely Italian food amongst other things for those needing a change). Would highly recommend a stay here for anyone looking for a more chilled stay than in central Aragum. Some great surf spots nearby also!
title: Beautiful location for a relaxed stay

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
text:
We loved our 6 nights at Whisky Point resort; simple but clean & comfortable cabins, friendly management & staff, a well made yoga pavilion, delicious food, all a short walk away from the surf at Pottuvil Point.

Nikola & Anna are superb hosts and the vibe is young and chilled out. It’s the perfect place to decompress from western cares
title: A perfect family decompression

placeInfo/address: Whisky Point Road, Pottuvil, Arugam Bay 32500 Sri Lanka
text:
We were 2x guests in the restaurant and on the beach.
If you dine in the restaurant, you can be a guest in the cabanas on the deserted beach. There are still deserted beaches there, it is an oasis of peace.
The owner is Italian and the cuisine is also of Italian quality. The resort (we were only in the restaurant and on the beach) is very clean and chill.

On our first visit everything was good. On the 2nd visit there was no more pizza (at 13.30h..it said that we can only order pizza from 12h), although the resort is known for it. Too bad! Some things on the menu were no longer available, even at breakfast.
The breakfast is ok, but not of special quality.

Be sure to try the papaya-mango-passionfruit juice - tastes great.
Prices in the middle segment for Arugam Bay....
title: the best pizzas - it has while it has

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
text:
Last Monday I most reluctantly tore myself away from the Max Wadya for the fifth time (third in three years, see March 2017). My favourite place to stay anywhere in the world (having visited five continents). If you want to avoid mass tourism here is a cocoon of privacy and pampering, with a beautiful garden with a private saltwater pool right on a beach with no or few other people in sight.  The property is walled-in except towards the sea, and very private.

The staff: as almost everyone else mentions, the staff led by Ranjan the manager are wonderful,  and spoil you rotten.
The food (full board is included): Outstanding,  based almost 100 pc on fresh, local produce. In addition you are offered afternoon tea, fresh king coconut etc. 
The sunsets: The beach faces west so offers beautiful sunsets. The garden has a special pavilion for sundowners.
The turtle hatching: with a little bit of luck you experience baby turtle releases from the private hatchery. We had two in seven days. Magical ! 
Available: ayurvedic massages, private yoga lessons
All in all; R&R heaven !
title: Away from the maddening crowd

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
text:
Yes - this was my sixth visit to Max Wadiya! And amazingly, the experience was even better this time!

Ranjan and his team welcomed us like old friends. They were even more creative with their cooking. Every meal was a delight, both in taste and the way it was presented. 

The beach was wonderful - more sand had been deposited since we were there last - and was pristine. The staff makes sure it is cleaned twice a day. 

We went to watch whales one morning - which was an outstanding experience. We were lucky enough to see a couple of blue whales. 

The garden had been redone - more flowers and improved lighting in the evenings. Ideal for whiling away the hours in a planter's chair.

There was a new masseur and he was very good.

Our stay was exceptional in every way! 

Thank you Ranjan and team for curating such an exceptional holiday experience for us!
title: My 6th Visit!

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
text: Fantastic time being looked after by Ranjan and his team in this gorgeous oasis. Plenty of adventures for our four year old and R and R for us - the food was the best we had in our two and a half weeks in Sri Lanka and the service was amazing, pre empting our every need but never being intrusive. Such warm lovely people - we will be back!
title: Amazing oasis with incredible service - a magical experience!

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
text:
Max Wadiya villa, is not only about vacations in a wonderful villa, it goes beyond.
It is the single and unique experience offered by the Max Wadiya villa. It is more than luxury villa, it is the sum of small details and attentions, all with a fantastic taste, which is giving an unmatched experience, allowing the visitors to almost reach the perfection of a classy layout. It is not ostentatious, it is just perfect.
This is also underlined by the warm welcome we received from the Sri Lankan people. Moreover, the crew, led by Ranjan, is incredible in its ability to serve, to stay discrete and its efficiency. Always with a smile, always ready to help to ease a stay in such a beautiful environment, they are accomplishing a fantastic work. Based on the kindness and the willingness to help, they are entirely part of the unique experience at Max Wadiya villa.
My family has spent a great moment, and we have enjoyed every minute. A Christmas break that everyone will remember forever. And what a place to have this family cheering.
Thanks a lot.
title: A great Family Christmas holiday in a lovely Paradise

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
roomTip: minimum stay is 4 nights but we wish we'd stayed a week or three! blue suite is terrific but all look good
text:
When I read all the raves about Max Wadiya and booked it for New Year’s, I didn’t think that the place could possibly live up to such high expectations. Was I wrong! It so far exceeded any expectations or any description written in these reviews that it’s impossible to put into words. I don’t even think the photos, as good as they are, do it justice. And, none of the rating categories go high enough…six or seven stars might be sufficient. But I’ll give it a go….

Even before we got there, I was impressed with Ruth’s friendly and professional management skills preparing us for our stay. She even called from France while we were there to make sure we were satisfied. And, upon arrival, everything was handled with speedy efficiency overlaid with Sri Lankan grace and smiling hospitably. Ranjan and his exceptional staff greeted us and brought us to our room, the blue suite (which again exceeds any description given here or by the hotel). It is spacious and comfortable and has a charming view from the balcony overlooking the lush landscape and out to the Indian Ocean. The Blue Suite is definitely sweet…however, both of the other suites look terrific, too. 

Everything about Max Wadiya is magical:  the accommodations, the grounds, the gorgeously endless empty beach. But wait there’s more. On New Year’s Day, at the last notice, masterful Ranjan arranged massages for both of us. Because it was so last minute, he had to use a back up masseuse, whose name I think, was Darshan (I’m sure I’m getting this wrong — my apologies). All I can say is if he was the back up, the regulars should watch out! He should be a regular for Max Wadiya. I’ve had hundreds of massages all over the world and this was one of the very best.

And then, there’s the food. Ranjan is a gourmet chef par excellence and designs the menu and works with his staff to deliver the best Sri Lanken food we had during our three weeks in the marvelous country of Sri Lanka. The culinary experience itself is worth the stay and is beyond compare. We didn’t get to do this but I would advise folks to spend long enough at Max Wadiya to take the cooking courses that Ranjan offers.

I could go on for pages but this is probably already too much. I do have to include the incredibly friendly and winsome staff that really makes the whole experience come together. Everyone is terrific and always available but never hovering — perfect in their invisible but constant presence. Always with a smile. Always gracious. Everyone made us feel welcome and they all deserve special mention:  Tharindu, Harsha, Chandma, Roshan, Indika, and, the cook, Prasanna. And, of course, Ranjan, who always went out of his way to include us and welcome us and make us feel comfortable every minute we were there. Thank you Ranjan!!!

We only stayed four nights and wish it had been weeks or a month. We will find a way to return.

Run don’t walk to Max Wadiya and have an authentic Sri Lankan experience that you will remember for a life time1
title: Sri Lankan Paradise

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
text: My family of 6 stayed here on the last leg of our Sri Lankan holiday. It was a wonderful place to relax with a very attentive staff, wonderful chef who discusses the days meals with you and gives you something different and delicious every day. Beach was empty and sea lovely once you’d got over the waves! No currents when we were there in late December. Highlights were-  being able to release baby turtles from the beach and fireworks on New Years Eve!

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
roomTip: The hotel has 2 suites and 4 double rooms
text:
Staying in the blue suite - a spacious and beautifully decorated with ancient and modern style - I had a fantastic relaxing holiday. The management run by Ranjan was indeed impeccable. the food was delicious - variated and different every meal!
A long deserted beach, made for long walks. The hotel also has a lovely pool area and a beautiful garden!
The little nearby town is at walking distance, and can be reached by the the beach. 
On the whole a totally relaxing and lazy (laundry included!) experience that I will happily return to!
title: Amazing hotel

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
text: If you are looking for the perfect hide away, quietness, beauty, nature, beachfront location, total relaxation - all while getting totally spoiled with the most amazing service and delicious food...look no further ;-) Max Wadiya is hard to describe with words! We enjoyed everything, had the beautiful blue room overlooking the garden and sea, got delicious breakfast served on our balcony, relaxed by the pool, had the best lunch prepared just to our likings with only fish, shellfish and salad, walked the beach and to the nearby local and lively village. Had a romantic time looking at the sunset before the amazing team served a full Sri Lankan dinner, the best we had on the whole vacation. The team did everything to make our stay, booked massage, private yoga lesson etc. We can’t wait to get back and want to stay longer next time....

roomTip: The best rooms are probably upstairs, but they were all excellent
text:
We have just spent a week at Max Wadiya and it was truly a fabulous holiday for us all, so relaxing and just a perfect place for our two little grandchildren who took a particular shine to Ranjan the delightful manager. The staff were charming and Ranjan was outstanding. 
They worked tirelessly to create the most wonderful holiday atmosphere. Set amongst tropical gardens, next to a stunning beach and sea-view, We ate far too well - the food was delicious!, relaxed completely and would return in a heart beat. I recommend it to anyone - we came as a family and nothing was too much effort.

title: Idyllic retreat

placeInfo/address: 147, Galle road Madampe, Ambalangoda 0351 Sri Lanka
text: We had the most amazing week staying at Max Wadiya. Ruth was great in the lead up to our visit and when there Ranjan and his team were so welcoming and helpful. The food was absolutely delicious and they even put on a fireworks display to help us celebrate my parents wedding anniversary. The rooms are all spacious and comfortable and the garden area with hammocks and pool was idyllic. The beach outside the house was so beautiful, and nearly always empty, except the fishermen bringing in the nets in the morning, which was amazing to see.
