text: We visited Sergeant house in June 3rd weekend; just few weeks after country opened after covid. My cousin found the place online and it's a gem hidden in Unawatuna. The villa has several bungalow style blocks and each block is unique, spacious and beautiful. The pool, Jacuzzi and beautifully decorated interior are top highlights. Staff also very friendly and treated us well. Breakfast also served neatly and it was delicious. We had our full privacy and it felt like we totally disconnected from world in a perfect hideout. Sergeant house in Unawatuna is truly the definition of an ideal villa and villa experience. Don't think twice to book this amazing place.

text: Our family of 4 stayed in the beautiful, immaculate villa for 2 nights, but could've stayed forever. We were pleasantly surprised by the gorgeous grounds and swimming pool, delicious food, ayurvedic massages, and excellent location. The entire staff, especially Chaturi, was so kind and gracious and made our stay even more special. She even helped to arrange transportation for our excursion to Galle, having our luggage met at the most delightful restaurant there before our long haul flight back to the USA. It was wonderful being close to Unawatuna beach and the hustle and bustle, but being able to retreat to our oasis in the evenings. The kids loves Wijaya beach and seeing the giant turtles was a highlight, followed by great pizza! I loved my morning yoga in the courtyard with my Ceylon black tea. We have stayed at amazing places all over the world, but Sergeant House definitely made an impression on us and we cannot wait to return here someday!
title: Gorgeous Oasis

placeInfo/address: Pamunugama Rd, Negombo 11504 Sri Lanka
text:
Fantastic hotel with excellent amenities- especially the pool and the spa. Staff so attentive and couldn’t do enough to make the stay enjoyable. 
In particular I enjoyed the 2 treatments I received from Koshika - she’s a fantastic therapist!
title: Perfect place to relax!

placeInfo/address: Pamunugama Rd, Negombo 11504 Sri Lanka
text:
My stay at Jetwing Lagoon was truly exceptional. The manager, Romello Perera, and Front Office Manager, Theresa Phyo, went above and beyond to ensure everything was perfect. Since this was my first time in Sri Lanka, I needed guidance in planning the rest of my journey—and their support was invaluable.

Theresa, who assisted me with reservations at other Jetwing properties, was amazing. Her kindness, professionalism, and attention to detail made coordinating the rest of my travels effortless and enjoyable. Romello took the time to follow up with me during the rest of my travels and stays at the other Jetwing properties.  

This was a very special trip for me, and the team at Jetwing Lagoon helped make it even more meaningful. The setting is serene, the service is impeccable, and the spirit of hospitality is truly alive. I’m deeply grateful and would highly recommend this beautiful sanctuary to any traveler.
title: Caring and kind customer service.

placeInfo/address: Pamunugama Rd, Negombo 11504 Sri Lanka
text:
This peaceful, beautifully and sleek decorated hotel allocated in  natural landscape overlooking the Negombo Lagoon is a haven of pure bliss.
Treatments at Prana wellness center are super relaxing-a special thank you to Sunetha!
Housekeeping is doing a great job too- rooms are super clean.
Tasty meals are available and all the staff around the property are very friendly.
Thanks also to the Front Office team, they organised my transport very well.
I'll return at the next possible opportunity to this haven of tranquility!

placeInfo/address: Pamunugama Rd, Negombo 11504 Sri Lanka
text: We had a lovely stay at Jetwing Lagoon on a half-board basis. The food was delicious with a nice variety at each meal. One of the highlights was the complimentary foot massage – it was truly relaxing! The staff were warm and welcoming, and the overall hospitality was excellent. A great place for a peaceful and comfortable getaway.
title: Relaxing Getaway with Great Food and Service

placeInfo/address: Pamunugama Rd, Negombo 11504 Sri Lanka
text:
Spa: We had a complimentary treatment by Tharushi and Insam at the Spa. They were really polite, kind and skillful. We regret not extending. 

Rooms: The rooms are nicely presented and very spacious. The in room toiletries are high-end and there's a strong attention to detail through-out. It seems to be a Bawa designed hotel and if you don't know who that is, give it a quick Google. 

Restaurant: I haven't yet had a chance to have a meal at the restaurant as I'm writing the review a few hours after check-in, at the request of staff. 

Pool / Beach / Grounds: The grounds seem really well maintained but it was monsoon rains during our stay and we didn't get a chance to use all of the facilities.
title: A true Bawa style Sri Lankan experience...

ownerResponse/text:
Dear Guest,

Greetings from Jetwing Lagoon Wellness!

Thank you for sharing your feedback. We are delighted to hear that you had a peaceful and relaxing stay with us. It's great to know that you enjoyed the serene ambiance, the room design, and especially the breakfast overlooking the Negombo lagoon.

Our team strives to make every guest feel welcomed and cared for, and your appreciation is highly appreciated. We are pleased that your experience was a memorable one, and we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back again.

Ayubowan! (May you live long!)

Romello Perera
General Manager
Jetwing Lagoon Wellness
placeInfo/address: Pamunugama Rd, Negombo 11504 Sri Lanka
text:
This was a beautiful peaceful hotel. Quiet and relaxing.
The staff were lovely and helpful. The breakfast was beautiful overlooking the lake with a nice selection of food. The design of the rooms and surrounding areas were sublime. A wonderful experience.
title: Jetwing Lagoon - a truly sublime place to stay.

ownerResponse/text:
Dear Guest,

Greetings from Jetwing Lagoon Wellness! 

Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed many aspects of your stay — from our expansive 100-meter pool and tranquil spaces to the beautifully designed rooms and the open-air bathroom concept which highlight the tropical modernist approach. It's rewarding to hear when our guests appreciate the details that make our hotel unique.

We are especially glad that you found the French press and ground coffee to your liking and it’s also great to hear your compliments on our restaurant and the view over the Negombo lagoon which is truly a special space to unwind.

Your kind words for Sunetha and Nuwan at our wellness center have been shared with them and they were truly delighted to hear your feedback. We are pleased the treatment left you rejuvenated and relaxed.

It was a pleasure to have you with us, and we hope you will return again to enjoy our legendary Sri Lankan hospitality.

Ayubowan! (May you live long!)

Romello Perera
General Manager
Jetwing Lagoon Wellness
placeInfo/address: Pamunugama Rd, Negombo 11504 Sri Lanka
text: Très bel hôtel avec une piscine incroyable de 100m de long et beaucoup de place pour s’installer confortablement à l’ombre, un très bon restaurant avec une vue sur la lagune et des chambres raffinées très joliment décorées de meubles en bois et une salle de bain couverte mais à l’air libre aussi démesurée que la piscine. Du jamais vue pour ce qui nous concerne. Un détail : du café moulu et une cafetière à piston pour, enfin, pouvoir déguster un café digne de ce nom. Le Sri Lanka est un pays magnifique avec énormément de qualités à la seule exception du café qui systématiquement mauvais. Nous avons eu le privilège de nous voir offrir un traitement au Spa par Voyageurs du Monde. Nous avons eu droit, ensemble à un massage du corps entier par Sunetha et Nuwan, nous en sommes ressortis sur un petit nuage, tous deux ont des mains et des doigts de fée. Le nirvana !
title: À voir pour sa piscine mais pas que, son centre de Welness est également un must

ownerResponse/text:
Dear Mr. Taylor,

Greetings from Jetwing Lagoon Wellness! 

Thank you for your heartfelt and detailed review. We are delighted to hear that your stay not only met but exceeded your expectations in every way.

It’s wonderful to know that the tranquility of the resort, the care from our associates, and the attention to detail across every department made a positive impression. Your kind words about Nuwan, Sunetha, and our Ayurvedic doctors have been shared with them, and they are deeply touched. Our team always endeavors to offer genuine, personalized care, and it's rewarding to see their efforts recognized so thoughtfully.

We are delighted that you appreciated the holistic approach to wellness we strive for at Jetwing Lagoon Wellness, from the Ayurvedic consultations to the cuisine, and that you found the food both flavorful and healthy. It’s also great to hear how seamless your experience felt — our team enjoys ensuring the guest experiences flow naturally, and your feedback reassures us that we are on the right path.

Your observations about the warmth and attentiveness of the team — from security to housekeeping — are the kind of experience we hope every guest walks away with. We are honored by your recommendation and truly grateful that you have chosen to share your experience with friends, family, and customers.

We would be absolutely delighted to welcome you both back again in the future. Until then, we send our warmest wishes and gratitude.

Ayubowan! (May you live long!)

Romello Perera
General Manager
Jetwing Lagoon Wellness
placeInfo/address: Pamunugama Rd, Negombo 11504 Sri Lanka
text:
The stay exceeded our expectations in every way. The resort is so tranquil,  the food is amazing,  the manorism of the the staff is out of this world, a total contrast to the attitude of most UK employees,  they literally can't do enough for you,  and their kind nature seems to come from the heart.

My Wife and I were treated by Nuwan and Sunetha in the Spa for the weeks duration. I have never met such peaceful and respectful people, what an amazing culture. 

Each morning we have traditional ayurvedic medicines and a consultation with the ayurvedic doctor, one of two doctors who are super friendly,  understanding and knowledgeable,  hey and guess what.....they don't kick you out after minutes,  you can converse with them for as long as you like and they tailor your days treated to suit , literally out of this world attitude to health and nutrition.  We now have both doctors WhatsApp details. The doctors literally could not believe how long it takes to get an appointment in the UK or that you can only have 5 minutes with a doctor per appointment.  The uk medical system needs a massive shake up

The attitude of the staff is the same throughout,  whether it is reception,  restaurant or kitchen,  everyone knows your name and room number. They always communicate between departments,  so if you book a tour,  they automatically adjust your meal time and treatment without you having to think about it.

The 100m pool is so clear and warm.

The room service is so quick and tidy

The food is next level flavoursome and super healthy.

Even security are friendly. 

Will definitely recommend to friends,  family and customers 😀
title: Body holiday amazing retreat

ownerResponse/text:
Dear Explorer54458911309,
Thank you very much for choosing to celebrate such a special occasion with us and for taking the time to share your lovely feedback. We are delighted to hear that your honeymoon stay was memorable. We are thrilled that you enjoyed the dining experience at Avartana and will make sure your compliments will pass on to the culinary team. It was our absolute pleasure to having you and look forward to welcoming you back soon!

placeInfo/address: 21 Galle Face Centre Rd, Colombo 00100 Sri Lanka
placeInfo/name: Itc Ratnadipa, A Luxury Collection Hotel, Colombo
text:
We stayed here for our honeymoon — and it genuinely made the trip feel special from the very start.

The property is stunning. Brand new, with clean, modern architecture and a calm energy throughout. We had a partial sea-facing room, which still offered a beautiful view — you could sit by the window for hours and just watch the ocean and city fade into each other.

The interiors were tasteful — minimal yet warm — and the in-room experience was smooth throughout. It never felt flashy or overwhelming, just simple luxury done right.

One of the biggest highlights was dining at Avartana. If you’re visiting, don’t miss it. It’s not your usual Indian fine-dine — it’s a full tasting experience with a carefully curated menu, incredible plating, and an ambience that really sets the tone. The storytelling behind each dish made the night feel like more than just dinner — it was a whole experience.

Some worth mentions are their high tea in the evening, the views and sunsets are breathtaking everyday, we satyed for 5 days, and we went there every day without missing it.

Do try their hand made nachos if you get a chance, those were delicious.

Also, there is infinity pool facing the sea, a sky lounge as well, free casino travel.

If you go to casino balies is worth visiting.

Massive thanks to Rephan Castelino, who helped us throughout the stay — from small details to last-minute help, he was just fantastic. Super professional, and made everything feel effortless.

If you’re planning a honeymoon or just want a relaxed luxury stay in Colombo — this place is absolutely worth it. Great food, peaceful rooms, kind staff, and just the right amount of quiet luxury.
title: Thoughtful Hospitality, Great Food & Views — Our Honeymoon at ITC

ownerResponse/text:

placeInfo/address: 21 Galle Face Centre Rd, Colombo 00100 Sri Lanka
placeInfo/name: Itc Ratnadipa, A Luxury Collection Hotel, Colombo
roomTip: Keep in mind that registration is on the second level, vehicles pull up to the first level, and another vehicle entrance at the zero level.
text:
This was the second ITC hotel that I've ever had the pleasure of staying at, and it did not disappoint. 

Colombo hotels seem to be in a race to provide the most luxurious facilities and best service. The ITC, opened just over two years ago, is a recent entry. The huge reception lobby on the second level gives a sweeping view of the ocean. The rooms are spacious and appointed nicely. There are some nice details, such as the lilly inlays in places like the room paneling and elevator flooring. The electrical outlets are all universal, accepting plugs from around the world. 

The staff were exceptional from the moment I walked in. I wish I had noted more names.

Suresh at the bell station helped me from the beginning and throughout my stay. Shaiya checked me  in. I was glad to to see Erandhi providing the same fine service that she brought from when I first saw when she worked previously at another property. Ohthers of note were Farzath, Piyumika, and Lehansa, and Nilantha, Shyomi and Shihami (or were they the same? Small name badges), And a couple of unnamed trainees!

I'm sorry that I am surely overlooking someone because all were so good at their jobs.
title: New and Over the Top

The hotel - inside and out - is GORGEOUS and massive. We had a room on the 31st floor, and the view out was incredible. The room was massive, with a giant soaking tub and walk in closet. We were also greeted with a beautiful spread wishing us happy anniversary on our bed, and a cake to celebrate. 

We had to leave the hotel super early in the morning, and they boxed up a breakfast for us to take with us since we'd miss their restaurant's opening.

All in all, a fantastic stay if you're looking for a nice place in Colombo!

text:
Exceptional Service by Vidu – A True Gem at ITC

I don’t usually write reviews, and I certainly don’t believe in writing negative ones—but whenever I experience something genuinely good, I always make it a point to appreciate it.

Recently, I had a reservation handled by a wonderful lady named Vidu from the ITC reservation team. What started off with a small misunderstanding could have easily gone downhill. But Vidu stepped in with such grace, professionalism, and empathy that it completely turned the situation around.

She didn’t just clear the confusion—she made me feel heard and respected. The way she calmly explained things and turned what could’ve been a frustrating experience into a pleasant one was nothing short of impressive. It’s rare to come across someone who combines competence with such warmth and emotional intelligence.

People like Vidu truly deserve recognition. She’s a shining example of what hospitality should feel like. Kudos to her—and to ITC—for nurturing such talent. It’s people like her who make a lasting impression.
title: Professional approach

text:
Our stay at this stunning hotel took an unexpected turn when we got flu during our trip. If it weren’t for Malshan, we truly don’t know how we would have managed. Every day, he brought us food and medicine, ensuring we were comfortable and taken care of. His kindness and attentiveness were beyond anything we could have imagined. We are incredibly grateful for his care—it was an absolute pleasure to meet someone so genuinely compassionate.

Aside from this, the hotel itself is simply breathtaking. The luxurious villas are designed to perfection, beautifully decorated, and equipped to the highest standard. The views from our villa were spectacular, and the beach was just as stunning—pristine, peaceful, and picture-perfect.

The staff here are warm, welcoming, and incredibly kind, making us feel at home from the moment we arrived. Every detail of this place is carefully thought out, creating an atmosphere of pure relaxation and indulgence.

Despite the unexpected challenges we faced, our experience at this hotel was unforgettable. Thank you again, Malshan, and the entire team, for making our stay so special.
title: Unforgettable stay thanks to exceptional care

placeInfo/address: Kimbula Thona Kalkudah Beach, Kiran 30000 Sri Lanka
text:
So many superlatives apply to this amazing “hotel” that it’s hard to select one in order to describe it. The overall  impression is of understated luxury on a stunning beach with accommodation of a very high standard. The whole place runs like clockwork under the eagle eye of Umberto, the Manager, whose staff cater to your every whim with a smile.

A special mention must be made of our butler Namal who was on the end of a phone (supplied by the hotel) to answer any queries and organise spa appointments (Bonita at the spa seems to have magical hands!) and the like.

The food is 5 star, the menu extensive and the portions huge. The whole team in the restaurant are efficient and friendly - we were looked after, in the main, by Baehum and Nawa with smiles however numerous our requests. And Ajidh, the bartender, mixes a great cocktail.

All in all this is the type of hotel we’ve always hoped to find - the luxurious tents on the beach with the glorious view of the sea make you feel as if you’re in your own paradise - and now we’ve found it. Even the occasional bouts of heavy tropical rain were an experience to enjoy.
title: Paradise found!!

placeInfo/address: Kimbula Thona Kalkudah Beach, Kiran 30000 Sri Lanka
text:
It is an ideal place to enjoy undisturbed proximity to nature and unpretentious luxury, attentive but unobtrusive service.
The hotel, although not brand new, is decorated with good taste and is carefully daily maintained. The territory is very spacious, with beautiful plants and organised in such a way that you practically do not feel other guests. The arrangement of the houses makes you feel as if you are alone by the ocean, in its immediate vicinity. We especially liked that everywhere in the hotel territory, except for the indoor areas, there are no concrete or asphalt paths, but there are well-groomed beach sand paths, which are surrounded by greenery.
The hotel has less than 20 rooms, we lived in an ocean villa/tent, but there are also garden villas, which are facing away from the ocean. The houses are partly tents, spacious, well and tastefully decorated with everything you need. The beds and pillows were comfortable. The outdoor shower room with flowers was especially beautiful.
The hotel pool is long and deep, you can really swim in it, not just dip in. The pool area, although quite small, is also comfortably furnished and has everything that a good hotel should have. There always were free sunbeds as every villa has it's own sunbeds and guests are mainly staying there.  
The hotel staff is well trained, very attentive and pleasant in communication. We especially want to praise and thank our personal assistant Malshan Wijewardana, this young man's professionalism, accuracy and wisdom far exceed his position in the hotel!
I also want to note the spa masseuse Bianca (I appologize if I slightly modified her name). Although the spa area is quite simply organised and decorated, Bianca did her job brilliantly every time I was there.
The a la carte breakfast had a wide selection for every taste, our various wishes were only met with a warm response. Since there are only various plantations in the area, we also ate lunch and dinner here. Food and drinks are not cheap at all for such a remote place, but all the dishes were of restaurant quality. It should be noted that there was also very good coffee here.
As a disadvantage, the location of the air conditioner in the room should be noted. It is located on the ground next to the bed and it is impossible to leave it turned on so that it does not blow directly into your face. So all 5 nights we slept without conditioner. We recommend moving the air conditioner to the bathroom area, then it will cool the tent evenly and unobtrusively.
Another warning is about the ocean rip currents. Read and learn about these currents, watch the ocean very carefully for 15 minutes to understand if the place you want to enter, does not have ocean rip currents. The beach is very wide, you can choose where to go swimming. It is best to do it in the shallow areas, which are every 50 meters on this beach. I think that the hotel management should inform and educate guests more about this phenomenon. Dangerous situations could be easily avoided if you are knowledgeable and informed about what to look out for, but can get into a big accident if you accidentally enter this current that pulls you into the ocean. Fortunately, my episode with this rip current ended well, because I knew what to do if the current pulls you into the ocean. However, it was an extremely unpleasant experience that could have been avoided if I had swum 50 meters further to the right or left. By the way ocean in general there was much calmer than in the south beaches of Sri Lanka.
title: Ideal place to enjoy undisturbed proximity to nature and unpretentious luxury

text: A real oasis on our recent Sri lankan 3 week visit. We made some bad accommodation choices on this trip – believing the trip or google reviews and ending up in some disappointing places. Not this hotel though – we loved everything about it. The ‘tent’ rooms were beautifully finished and furnished, comfortable bed, great showers and services/wifi etc. The food in the restaurant was excellent and very well-priced for the quality. A lovely beach, illuminated palm trees, great poolside bar and lounge…. Very good value for money also. The manager, Umberto, went above and beyond and seems to be on top of all the details of customer service and the logistics of a higher-end place like this. We would highly recommend a few days at this place to unwind and to laze, eat and drink fabulously, away for a few days from the general chaos of other parts of Sri Lanka.
title: an excellent choice

text: Had a wonderful 'wellness' stay at Jetwing Lagoon as a Sri Lankan couple. The staff were incredibly helpful and kind. The stay was designed with the physical and mental wellbeing in mind. For example, use of mobile phones was not encouraged for digital detox, although this was not mandatory. For physical detox, the meal ingredients are specially selected to ensure the food intake during the stay is healthy. In our stay, we opted for special Ayurveda treatments (Authentic abyanga - 60 minutes, foot and head treatments - 30 minutes) and we would like to recommend Nuwan, Sunetha, Mahel and Insam for relaxing treatments. Both the large 100 metre pool and the pool next to the beach add to this fantastic experience. Meals at the restaurants were served with a lot of care. We specifically enrolled to 'Balance and Bliss wellness package' for a single night stay. Compared to highly touristy places like Hikkaduwa, this place was very calm and there was no loud music. Therefore, we highly recommend Jetwing Lagoon Wellness for a calm stay in Negambo, Sri Lanka.
title: A Calm and Relaxing Stay

placeInfo/address: 24/4 Welle Dewalaya Rd, Unawatuna 80600 Sri Lanka
text:
Отличный вариант для отпуска на Шри Ланке. Остановливаемся в этом отеле уже второй раз. Это о многом говорит.
Очень чистый, светлый отель с приветливым персоналом и отличным хозяином. 
По факту:
Хорошие номера, огромная мягкая кровать, для ребенка тоже дополнительная кровать, а не какая нибудь раскладушка.
Современный санузел, все работает, горячая вода есть всегда.
В номере есть чайник, чайный набор, стаканы, кружки и даже тарелка с ножом для фруктов.
Хороший балкон, стол и стулья, большая сушилка для белья.
Уборка ежедневно, смена белья раз в три дня.
Мощный кондиционер и потолочный вентилятор.
Строят новый корпус, первый этаж уже готов, думаю там номера ещё лучше, они новые.
Есть генератор, поэтому отключение электричества не страшны.
Завтраки съедобные, но однообразные, на перекус нормально.
Отель закрыт на электронный замок, никто чужой не заходит.
Единственный минус на сегодняшний момент это не благоустроенный внутренний дворик, но думаю по окончании работ его приведут в порядок.
Отель расположен немного в стороне, поэтому шума с улицы нет.
До пляжа 5-7 минут по улице с кафе и магазинами.
Вернёмся сюда обязательно.
Спасибо!
title: Отличный отель на Шри.

placeInfo/address: 24/4 Welle Dewalaya Rd, Unawatuna 80600 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Средства от Комаров уже были в номере, но нам не понадобились )))) переходники тоже не нужны , там розетки уже подходят под наши вилки!
text:
Замечательный отель! Все продуманно и хорошо работает : напор в душе отличный , горячая вода была всегда, есть кран для ног, обычный душ, тропический душ Лейка сверху , гигиенический душ ! Кондиционер огромный  и вентилятор на потолке дополнительно  все работает на 5+ , чай, кофе и сухое молоко всегда в номере , кулер рядом с номером полон всегда ! 
Завтраки - отдельное удовольствие!!! Хозяйка умеет подбирать качественные продукты - таких вкусных фруктов, как на завтраке мы сами купить не смогли ))) знает она где и что купить ! Свежайшая  выпечка 2-3 видов каждый день , яйца в любых видах , сосиски - объедение !!! Джемы из ананаса или маракуйя! Чай , кофе и молоко ! Йогурты - такого вкусного я не ела даже в России ))))  
Отель, еда - все наивысший балл !!! 
Полотенца на пляж дают и мокрые забирают !!! 
Кровать реально ТРЕХСПАЛЬНАЯ  ! Матрас удобный , 4 удобные подушки , ещё нам дали одеяла пледы - пушистики , что кстати ибо охлаждающая техника работает , как зверь !!!! Ещё есть диванчик - доп спальное место , тоже удобный ! Хозяева когда что то покупают в свой отель берут все лучшее похоже, и это касается всего ! 
На пляже когда разговаривали с отдыхающими многие говорили, что хотели в этот отель , но он был в стопе уже и не зря - замечательный отель , который сделает ваш отдых комфортным ! Большое спасибо семье которая держит этот замечательный отель ! Никаких огорчений мы не испытали в нем ! Утром я раскладывала орешки и к нам приходили дикие павлины , бурундуки, и ягуана ! На стене живут два гекончика и вечером выходят на охоту к нашему удовольствию !!! От всего сердца рекомендую данный отель !!!! Здесь все делает вас  счастливым !
title: Райское место с павлинами

placeInfo/address: 24/4 Welle Dewalaya Rd, Unawatuna 80600 Sri Lanka
text: Очень чисто. Безупречно. Белье меняли каждый день или через день. Уборка в номере каждый день. Отель новый и очень все продуманно для комфорта отдыхающих. Кровать удобная,высыпались. Никакого шума,до пляжа 5-7 минут неторопливой ходьбы.
title: Отличное место

placeInfo/address: 24/4 Welle Dewalaya Rd, Unawatuna 80600 Sri Lanka
text:
Это лучший отель, который удалось посетить в азии, номер делюкс на первом этаже просто огромный, уборка каждый день, новый ремонт. 
Очень удобная локация, пляж 5 минут, кафе , рестораны. До других пляжей на тук тук 10 минут. Хозяева отеля очень дружелюбные люди))) 
Рекомендую к посещению 10 из 10.
title: Super

placeInfo/address: 24/4 Welle Dewalaya Rd, Unawatuna 80600 Sri Lanka
text: We loved our stay. All the essential amenities were there. Very clean and tidy. New property. Excellent location and the host was very hospitable. Room interior is very pleasant to the eye. Bed is super comfortable and most importantly the bathroom is spacious and clean.
title: Love this place!

placeInfo/address: 24/4 Welle Dewalaya Rd, Unawatuna 80600 Sri Lanka
text:
В целом нам очень понравился отпуск в Шри-Ланке, и во многом его благополучие - заслуга этого отеля! Мы читали и слышали всякое, с чем можно столкнуться на острове, но в этом отеле никакие трудности и сложности нас не коснулись!
Теперь чуть больше полезных подробностей:
Расположение отеля вполне удачное. Не первая линия, но идти до пляжа совсем недалеко, минут 10. При этом он расположен не на основной улице, а, скажем так, в переулке, что избавляет от шума и суеты.
Персонал очень приветливый, все стараются, это чувствуется. Говорят на английском, можно с переводчиком в телефоне.
По масштабу отель небольшой.
Вход - по умолчанию закрыт (не проходной двор), свои заходят через электронный замок и карту. Соответственно, о сохранности имущества можно не беспокоиться. В номере есть сейф, без отдельной платы, с кодовым замком.
Ремонт свеженький, в светлых тонах, вполне приятно.
Местами есть неаккуратности в ремонте, но это мелочь.
Концепция интерьера такова, что он светлый, просторный, высокие потолки и без мебели практически. Шкафов нет. Функцию мебели выполняют конструктивные элементы стен (что-то вроде полок, столешниц).
Это касается и кровати - и это огромный плюс! То есть кровать - вроде как из камня, на котором лежит матрас (вполне хороший). Соответственно, кровать устойчивая, не скрипит совсем! )
Единственное - углы кровати - с ними надо быть осторожнее. Поскольку она белая, как и весь интерьер, бывает, не увидишь, и ударяешься об углы. После нескольких раз, вырабатывается рефлекс быть осмотрительней с этим )
Стены, кстати, из кирпича (или что-то вроде того), в общем, звуков из соседних номеров не слышно.
Такие стены и кровать - большие плюсы этого отеля, на мой взгляд.
Розетки - адаптированные. Спокойно включали и зарядники, и ноутбук. Никаких головняков с адаптерами не потребовалось.
Для ноутбука у нас в номере был подходящий столик. Также было кресло. В результате чего у меня было более-менее нормальное рабочее место.
Электричество на острове не особо стабильное, но в отеле есть свой генератор. Поэтому проблем с электричеством у нас не было, как и с водой. Один раз из-за переключения электричества сгорел блок питания у wi-fi роутера. Хозяева решили проблему буквально в течение 30 минут, пришли с электриком, всё сделали.
Есть балкон, там раскладная сушилка для белья. Вид на двор (где смотреть особо нечего, в общем-то).
Кондиционер отлично справляется с охлаждением, плюс есть вентилятор на потолке (мы им не пользовались).
Ещё есть чайник, и ложат чай, кофе (которые мы в номере особо не пили).
Полотенца есть - как в номере (меняют раз в 3 дня, вроде), так и пляжные в холле можно брать. А вот халатов не предусмотрено.
Предварительно, перед поездкой почитавши про Шри-Ланку, мы взяли с собой фумигаторы от комаров и т.д. )) Но они вообще ни разу не пригодились. Комаров тут мало и они маленькие. У нас в России (на Южном Урале) их намного больше. На всякий случай на ночь мы закрывали дверь балкона, так сказали при заселении. Из насекомых тут столкнулись с муравьями, которые очень любят фрукты ) В один момент их стало много, и уборщик что-то сделал, наверно, потом их не стало.
В номере есть небольшой холодильник.
Что касается питания - у нас были включены завтраки. Шведский стол. Выбор блюд совсем небольшой, но нам хватало, в принципе, подкрепиться с утра. Овощи (огурчики, помидорчики), яйца (по разному приготовленные), сосиски (не пробовали), тосты, фрукты (ананас, попайя, банан) и очень вкусные кексики. Была ещё каша, но на молоке, мы такое не едим )
Во дворе планируется бассейн, но это будет примерно года через 3, скорее всего, так сказала хозяйка. Пока там просто ровный грунт, даже без травы. Возможно, стоило бы его пока хоть газоном засадить.
В целом, повторюсь, мы остались доволь��ы отелем. Отличное соотношение цена-качество!
title: Хороший отель!

placeInfo/address: 24/4 Welle Dewalaya Rd, Unawatuna 80600 Sri Lanka
text: Отдыхали в этом отеле с 22.01.25 по 01.02.25. По меркам Шри-Ланки отель шикарный. В номере было всё необходимое, чайник, посуда, огромная кровать с удобнейшим матрасом, сейф, сушилка. Всегда есть свет и горячая вода (у них генератор). Пляжные полотенца предоставляют. Каждый день убирались и меняли все полотенца. Когда вернулись с двухдневной экскурсии вообще были в приятном шоке, они постирали и развешали сушиться все наше грязное белье, которое валялось у меня в пакете на полу. Почистили всю обувь и аккуратно расставили). Из живности в номере не видели никого, только один раз геккончика на балконе. Каждое утро пока пили кофе на балконе любовались павлинами и бурундуками. Рядом с отелем вся необходимая для жизни и отдыха инфраструктура. Пляж в пяти минутах ходьбы. Хочу сказать спасибо всему персоналу отеля и пожелать дальнейшего процветания)
title: Классный отель с приветливым персоналом

ownerResponse/text:
Thank you for your wonderful review and for rating us 10/10! We truly appreciate your kind words about our hotel, location, and cleanliness. It was a pleasure hosting you, and we’re delighted to hear that you had a great stay.

We also value your feedback on breakfast variety and the addition of a rooftop grill area. Guest experience is our top priority, and we’re excited to share that we have plans to enhance our outdoor spaces, including improvements to our garden and the addition of an outdoor kitchen and grill area. We hope to welcome you back in the future so you can enjoy these upgrades firsthand!

Safe travels, and we look forward to seeing you again.

Best regards,
Heaven By O. – Unawatuna

text:
10 from 10.

Nice hotel owned by good local couple) 

I visited 4 hotels from Mirissa to Hikkaduwa and this one was the best by location and room renovation. There were always clean and good vibe. 

Question for some improvement:
I would like more variety for breakfast and a grill with tables on the roof for a better customer experience.
title: Good place to stay at

Мы рады, что вы оценили тишину улицы, близость ресторанов, спа и магазинов, а также гостеприимство нашей команды 💙. Ваши рекомендации – лучшая награда для нас!

Будем рады видеть вас снова в Heaven By O. в будущем! ✨

С наилучшими пожеланиями,
Heaven By O. – Unawatuna
placeInfo/address: 24/4 Welle Dewalaya Rd, Unawatuna 80600 Sri Lanka
text: Хороший отельчик. Свеженький, видимо не давно построенный/отремонтированный.  Не далеко от лучшего на острове пляжа (проверенно, поверьте). В тихой улочке. Рядом рестараны, спа, магазины. Приветливый персонал. Рекомендую всем!!!
title: Пляжный отдых

Огромное спасибо за упоминание нашей команды! Макси, его супруга и помощник по хозяйству передают вам свои искренние пожелания и благодарность. 😊

placeInfo/address: 24/4 Welle Dewalaya Rd, Unawatuna 80600 Sri Lanka
text: Не могла не написать, что отель на Шри- Ланке, это основное на отдыхе. Без горячей воды, кондиционера, без сейфа и сушилки для белья очень грустно. Мы это прочувствовали в прошлом году. Поэтому в этом году очень внимательно заранее выбирали отель . Попали прямо в точку.(благодаря прочтению отзывов) Абсолютный комфорт! Спасибо Макси, его супруге и помощнику по хозяйству  за предоставленный отличный отдых! 10 баллов этому отелю. Единственное пожелание, побыстрее засадить лужайку растениями и газоном.
title: Отличный отель

ownerResponse/text:
Уважаемые гости!

Огромное спасибо за ваш такой подробный и искренний отзыв! 🙏 Мы рады, что вам понравился наш отель, номер и обслуживание. Ваши добрые слова вдохновляют нас и помогают становиться ещё лучше!

Мы очень ценим, что вы отметили внимание к деталям в номерах, от уюта до удобств, таких как посуда, средства гигиены, розетки и даже пледы. 😊 Нам приятно знать, что всё это сделало ваш отдых комфортным.

Природа вокруг действительно уникальна, и мы рады, что вы насладились встречей с павлинами 🦚 и другими интересными моментами, которые делает наш уголок незабываемым. А ещё приятно слышать, что и комары вас не потревожили, ведь забота о комфорте гостей — наш приоритет.

Большое спасибо, что упомянули другие полезные нюансы, такие как русские инструкции, услуги прачечной и безопасность территории. Это, безусловно, поможет будущим путешественникам, которые рассматривают наш отель для своего отдыха. 🌴

Мы с нетерпением ждём вас снова в следующем году! 🏖️  💕 Если у вас будут особые пожелания к следующему визиту, дайте нам знать заранее — мы будем рады помочь сделать ваш отдых ещё лучше.

До скорой встречи и ещё раз спасибо за ваши теплые слова! 💐

С уважением и благодарностью,
Команда Heaven By O.
placeInfo/address: 24/4 Welle Dewalaya Rd, Unawatuna 80600 Sri Lanka
text:
Чудеснейшее место! Только вернулись домой. Нам понравился и отель, и номер, и люди. Чистота кругом! Встретили соком и холодными полотенцами, пока заселялись. Заселение прошло быстро. Хозяева не говорят на русском, но все инструкции и подсказки подготовлены заранее на А4 на русском языке. Подсказали в каком направлении купаться, где кушать. Кто первый раз и вот вышел с машины, без карты и интернета, это удобно. Очень понравился приём! Номер тоже понравился. В номере 2 кровати, двухспальная и одноместная для ребёнка. Кондиционер, вентилятор,сушилка для вещей! Наверно тут всё было продумано до мелочей, чтобы мы могли отдыхать! Шампунь, гель, крем для тела, мыло. Чай, кофе, сухое молоко, сахар, чайник, в коридоре куллер с водой без ограничения. Есть услуга прачечной за небольшую плату. Чужим действительно не попасть на территорию, вход один и с ключом (ну или в звонок позвонить). Балкон, где жалюзи висят. Закрыт от глаз, отдыхаешь и наслаждаешься.
Приеду ли я сюда ещё раз? Безусловно да! Мне очень понравилось.
А какая тут природа! Кстати на самой территории нет обезьян, варанов или там змей. Можно абсолютно не боятся за себя и ребенка. Я прям специально читала отзывы и исключала те места, где писали, что пришли обезьяны или там пришёл варан. Я прям именно без всякой живности хотела. Мои ожидания оправдались. Нам вдалеке показали обезьян, варана на чужой крыше и его ещё  увидели на улице в ручье)) плыл, он не кусается. 
Но больше всего меня поразил павлины! Они как у нас голуби или воробьи свободно перемещаются по улицам! Будете идти на пляж, недоходя до coconat ресторана на 3м этаже слева  можно увидеть павлина с красивущим хвостом! Нереальные непередаваемые ощущения!
А ещё вернусь опять к отелю. Я мерзлячка, а мужу жарко. В номере пододеяльник, но муж попросил одеяло и принесли такой чудесный новогодний плед!!! (когда включали кондиционер, я накрывала ь дополнительно ещё и пледом поверх пододеяльника. А когда уезжали уже домой, предложили по завтракать рано утром в 6 утра! Очень приятна такая забота. Спасибо большое! Планируем  к вам приехать через год повторно!
PS спасибо жильцам из 204 номера, если вы читаете мой отзыв, то ваш доширак прям очень был кстати в один из вечеров с дождём мы его съели с удовольствием!!!
Кстати, в номере розетки разъёмы на все варианты, мы не покупали заранее переходники и на месте не пришлось покупать.
И комары нас не доставали, ни одного не видели. В номере была уже баночка с жидкостью от комаров, в розетку включали. Не знаю хозяева предоставляют или предыдущие жильцы оставили, но спасибо за такую заботу! А ещё!! Что мне понравилось, что есть тарелки, нож, доска разделочная! Очень удобно. А ещё в номере есть 2 тумбочки и один шкаф, есть вешалка и плечики. Вот реально, всё пр��думано, всё для удобства до мелочей. Всё есть, мы только щётки и пасту купили.
За время отпуска со светом и горячей водой тоже проблем не было.
(Огромный привет от семьи из g-03).
И ещё раз очередное кстати. Если пойти направо, как вышли из отеля, там в конце будет кафешка, там мы видели светлячков! Впервые в жизни вживую увидела светлячков!

text:
Отель выбирали тщательно, так как ехали с 2 маленькими детьми. Муж нашёл и выбрал этот отель, чему мы очень рады.
Отель светлый, чистый, приятно находиться. Уборка в номере каждый день. Белые полотенца и постельное белье отельное, хорошего качества. Хозяева очень стараются для  комфортного проживания гостей. Помощник очень добродушный, отзывчивый.
Завтраки вкусные и сытные: йогурт, фрукты сезонные (банан, папайя), яйца всех видов приготовления, сосиски, тосты, кекс вкусный, собственного приготовления. 
Высокие потолки, бесшумный лифт OTIS. 
Ещё планируется бассейн взрослый и детский. Так же большой плюс для семей, что не шумно, окна выходят во двор и нет шума с улицы. Рядом много кафе, ресторанов, магазинов, фруктовых ларьков. С детьми ездили на пляж Джангл бич, там волн нет, есть обезьянки, красивая, живописная бухта. 
Общались с другими туристами, которыми не повезло с отелем, жаловались на грязь, некуда повесить белье. Тут же отдельная большая сушилка для белья, есть своя  прачечная, можно отдать вещи на стирку. 
Мы остались очень довольны и отдыхом и отелем. Благодарим🙏❤️

text: Всем здравствуйте! Хотела бы написать о своём впечатлении об отеле Heaven By O. Отдыхала семьёй с 04.11 по 15.11.2024 года. Отель очень чистый, светлый и просторный. Номер у нас был deluxe очень просторный, светлый. В номере есть всё что необходимо: сейф, кондиционер, холодильник, телевизор, фен, розетки, которым не нужны переходники. В номере каждый день уборка, полотенца и постельное белье белоснежное. У нас были завтраки очень достойные, яйца варёные, омлет, яичница, сосиски, тосты, фрукты, кексы, чай, кофе, сок свежевыжитый, творожок, сухой завтрак для детей. Всё вкусное и свежее. Океан находится от отеля в 4-х минутах пешком, рядом находятся различные рестораны, кафешки, фруктовые и сувенирные лавки. На Шри-Ланке были впервые и выбор отеля нас не подвёл мы очень довольны им. Обязательно буду всем его рекомендовать и в следующий раз сами опять вернёмся в Heaven By O!!!

placeInfo/address: Matara Rd, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
roomTip: For the best Sri Lankan homemade food visit Nimal’s Kitchen which is just 3 mins away by tuk tuk from the hotel
text: The Sandhya is perfect place to chill and relax. It is situated on a quiet and beautiful beach which is good for surf beginners. All team members are very helpful and always go extra mile for their guests. Food and drinks are great and style of the place is just impeccable.  In case you want some crowd Unawatuna which has nice bars and Galle which has a lot of cozy local shops and good restaurants are just 15 and 30 mins away by tuk tuk
title: Would definitely recommend the Sandhya as a couples / surf beginners getaway! Best of luck to the team!

placeInfo/address: Matara Rd, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
text: We had an absolutely wonderful stay at the Sandhya. We had been on a road trip around Sri Lanka the week before and so we wanted to sit and relax for a bit and it was the perfect place. The restaurant makes fresh, amazing food including a tuna tataki that was delicious. Enjoyed chilling in the beach chairs and watching the surfers out front. We were in the suite which is absolutely glorious. Floor to ceiling windows gives great light with views of the sunset in the evening. Highly recommend this hotel if you are looking to kick back and relax in style.
title: Kick back, relax in style

placeInfo/address: Matara Rd, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
text: my girlfriend and I only booked 1 week at first.  But then we extended it by another 2 weeks!  The hotel was stunning.  The rooms were well furnished and very clean.  The staff was extremely friendly and helpful!  Hotel manager Nuwan was excellent!  The kitchen is delicious!  The breakfast is very fine (fresh fruits, juices, toast, pancakes, etc.).  in the kitchen is TOP!  The menus are freshly prepared!  Thanks for the great 3 weeks!  Roman & Selina
title: excellent stay!

placeInfo/address: Matara Rd, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
text:
I only stayed at this hotel for one night, having not quite been able to fit it in for a return visit but my favourite in terms of front row beach front hotels in Ahangama. The service impeccable, the rooms stylish (and with everything thought of- Bluetooth speakers, robes, slippers, towel hooks) and the food equally as delicious. 
My only 'complaint' would be the small hedge that separates the lounging area from the beach, which presumably is for privacy but in effect blocks your view of what is a beautiful beach/sea! Without this, I think I'd struggle to fault it!! The position of the hotel (opposite other great eateries) the staff, the service, the style, feel, view etc are all top notch! 
Thank you to the team at Sandhya who made me feel so welcome, and like a long lost friend when turning back up for a drink right at the end of my trip.
title: Stunning

placeInfo/address: Matara Rd, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
roomTip: In front of the hotel is the best restaurant in Sri Lanka - must try CITRA
text: Wow wow wow wow the best and the perfect spot for couples that also like surfing. The hotel is amazing and beautiful,very ecological and blending with the environment. the staff is friendly and welcoming, breakfast is fresh and tasty, and dinner also (if you decide ti enjoy dinner in the hotel) the beach area is the best in my opinion, the room is cleaned like 10 times a day … never come across such good service.
title: Best I ever he’d!

placeInfo/address: Matara Rd, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
text: The stay was magical. Me and my Mom truly enjoyed it.  Mr. Nuwan and rest of the staff were truly great. Wonderful attention to detail and hospitality. All the rooms in the hotel have a fantastic sea view. I would highly recommend staying there.
title: Wonderful Stay!

placeInfo/address: Matara Rd, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
text:
Arriving at The Sandhya is a bit like arriving at a stunning private villa where long lost friends are waiting to greet you. Such was the level of pre-arrival care provided by the wonderful Nuwan and his team - both during the booking process and our room preferences, as well as the message we received with information about our arrival and room (due to a very early morning arrival time). 
We arrived the the hotel just as dawn was breaking. The high wall that separates the property from the main road outside gives away nothing about just how beautiful it is. The design, as mentioned by many, is fresh and contemporary and the large windows looking out on to the ocean framed by palm trees give the illusion of a painting - interrupted only by the sound of the crashing waves. The sky was filled with hues of pink when we arrived... 
Our short stay at The Sandhya was flawless. Rooms are spacious, airy, well-apppointed, clean and filled with light. The vibe is relaxed all day, the food is delicious and the service is spot on. The staff were all kind and attentive, and efficiently handled all the arrangements in terms of restaurant reservations and transfers that we requested. 
The beach in front of the hotel is stunning - there are good easy waves for beginner surfers, and powder white sand for sunset walks. The location of the property is also great, as it is a short drive from Galle (don't miss a trip there), Koggala lake (don't miss this either!), as well as a number of beaches and restaurants in the wider area. 
A turtle laying her eggs on the beach in front of the hotel was my last memory of The Sandhya before I departed. So special!
Thank you Nuwan, thank you to the entire team for the most wonderful stay! I can't wait to return. 
To quote one of the guests I met during my stay " There's a new day between Saturday & Sunday, it's called Sandhya" :-)
title: The gorgeous Sandhya

placeInfo/address: Matara Rd, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
text:
Fresh and contemporary designed hotel with local touches and great location at the beach (almost private one). Not too long but well thought out menu and cocktail list, I got one of the best poke bowls in my life, breakfast was delicious, drinks are refreshing and recharging and “Christmas” doughnut was "to die for"… Hotel’s staff is just excellent and its really makes the difference (many thanks to Dilan, Naveen and the rest of the team). Alan, the owner is a wonderful host and really easy to get with. He made a great job to create such place which is very different for the rest you will find on the island.
Location wises its also pretty good with decent number of options to eat&drink in walking distance or short ride. Galle Fort (which is “the must visit”) is also in ~20 minutes ride only.
Only the thing I would improve is to add more shadow for breakfast / lunch seating as it's not always easy to enjoy a meal at sun heat.
Overall, it was truly enjoyable stay and I hope will have a chance to come back. My five stars!
title: Close to be ideal

text:
This is the third time we came to the Sandhya and every single time we fall in love with this piece of heaven, we just can’t get enough of it! 

It’s difficult to explain how special this place is. The hotel is just stunning, incredibly beautifully designed, we fell in love with every single corner of it. You feel so tranquil as soon as you come in and amazed by the beauty of the place. 

The Sandhya is literally on the most beautiful tropical beach  (with amazing waves for surfing!). The rooms have an amazing sea view with floor to ceiling windows, you can see the most incredible sunrises and  sunsets from your room! The beds are really comfortable, we wish we could take them home!

The staff is incredibly professional, so kind and will go above and beyond to make sure you are happy and you have anything you need at any point! They always surprise us with little treats (they baked our favorite cake as a surprise). They truly make you feel at home. We can’t thank them enough for their attention and kindness. 

The food is also delicious, everything is super fresh and home made! They have an amazing cocktail list too! 

I never post reviews but I can’t help it for The Sandhya - it’s such a special place! Without any doubt, our favorite place. Everything is beautifully presented and every little detail is thought through to make you feel at home. We always feel extremely relaxed, happy, in touch with nature when we go there, and we just can’t wait already to be back!! Thank you to Alan and his team for creating such a blissful and unique place. We’ll see you again soon, Dani and Marina x

placeInfo/address: Matara Rd, Ahangama 80650 Sri Lanka
text:
From start to finish this hotel has been absolutely incredible. We leave tomorrow and we don’t want to go!!

Before we arrived we had a few communications with the hotel as we needed to check if we could arrange a PCR test as this was our last hotel of our trip before flying home.

They always replied so quickly and were of such great help. I would say the most helpful hotel we’ve ever stayed in!

When we arrived we were taken to our room and they had put out lovely balloons for our honeymoon and my husband had surprised me with some prosecco and flowers which was so lovely that he arranged with the hotel.

 The rooms are beautiful, so spacious and stylish and on the last few nights they even upgraded us to the best room as it was our honeymoon.

They also supply great toiletries in the rooms with added mosquito balm from a local Sri Lankan supplier than was great and very helpful. 

The help with our fit to fly PCR tests back to the uk was organised so easily that we didn’t need to worry at all and we also organised a taxi for a day trip which they even managed to get discount for us on.

The hotel is stunning with beautiful furniture throughout. 
An amazing location right on a stunning beach.

The food was great, as we were here for 6 nights we tried a lot of it and it was all delicious.

The service is outstanding, everyone is so kind and generous and they make you feel so welcome throughout.

I could go on for days about how much we have enjoyed our stay here!

Thank you Sandhya for the most amazing end to our honeymoon! We hope to be back to this beautiful country and your beautiful hotel again some day!
title: Outstanding and beautiful honeymoon stay

text:
I went to karpaha sands with my wife and two toddlers.

The road to the resort is a little rough but after that everything was perfect.

The staff greeted us and I must say the staff service  in our entire 4 day stay was excellent 
The staff were particularly accomodating and excellent with our kids 

We stayed in one of the kolaya villas which is really nice, it was your own space , large villa w large deck and your own private sand lawn , made for full relaxation, reflection and chill vibes
The outdoor waterfall shower was amazing and the villa itself has everything we needed 

The only potential difficulty we had was there were a lot of stray dogs and with toddlers we had to keep a close eye on them 

The facilities were great 
We enjoyed amazing breakfasts and meals at dinner 
The food was on point and I particularly found the Sri Lankan cuisines excellent (being Sri Lankan myself I feel im a fair judge) 

The pool and amentities were great , we enjoyed a movie on the beach, the shanti spa and my daughter had some henna done not to mention a daily visit to the pool

Overall it’s a place for full relaxation 
We did venture out to batticaloa each day but really you could spend the entire time at the resort and just chill 

We really couldn’t fault the stay and there were lots of little touches and nuances in the service that I haven’t listed but were excellent

Karpaha sands is a great destination 
A little out of the way
But well worth it 

Ty for a great time
Easily the best hotel / resort we’ve stayed at
title: Best resort stay !!!!

placeInfo/address: Kimbula Thona Kalkudah Beach, Kiran 30000 Sri Lanka
text:
Dette er et 5 stjernet lille hotel med et afslappet touch. 
En gemt perle nede af en ujævn grusvej. Men man skal ikke lade sig snyde. Man ankommer til en grå mur, hvor alt åbner sig op til paradis. De fantastiske luksuriøse telte ligger skjult mellem palmerne på den 15 km lange sandstrand. Havet er salt, rent, blødt og fantastiske til korte og lange svømmetur eller bare til at køle af. Man kan også vælge en svømmetur i den lange ferskvands pool.
De 2 venner der har bygget hotellet har gjort så meget for at bruge alt, der er i nærområdet. Brug af regnvand og filtrere saltvand. Der er ikke sparet eller taget genveje her. Selv valg af toiletpapir er gennemført. Fiskerne der fanger fisk hver dag bliver servert få timer efter i restauranten. Kokken og hans mad er en oplevelse for sig selv. Alt kan lade sig gøre. Den skønne energi bliver skabt af personalt der er så positive og smilende.

Taknemmelig for at de prioriterer de lokale råvarer,  lokale bygningsmaterialer og i det hele taget tænker genanvendelse.
title: 5 stjerner med et afslappet touch

placeInfo/address: Kimbula Thona Kalkudah Beach, Kiran 30000 Sri Lanka
text:
Overall we had a wonderful stay at Karpaha Sands as part of our honeymoon in August. The hotel was beautiful. We stayed in one of the ocean front suites and it was such a gorgeous room, with wonderful amenities and décor. We had our own sun loungers to use on the beach which was a lovely touch and the butler service was fantastic, it was very special to have breakfast brought to us in the morning to have on the veranda close to the ocean. The massage treatments were brilliant, and the swimming pool was lovely. The beach and ocean were beautiful. 

Unfortunately there were two areas that we felt needed improvement which is why we haven't given a five star rating. First, there a quite a few dogs that live/roam on the beach and on one day some of them got into a fight which was quite distressing to see, especially as one of the dogs became injured and was bleeding. There was also a cat in the restaurant area that was limping. It was unclear whether the hotel owns the animals or if they were wild, but either way it could be doing more to make sure the animals have good welfare, including medical treatments.

Second, the quality of the meals was inconsistent. On several occasions the dishes we ordered were missing key elements without any acknowledgment or explanation from the staff, which was disappointing given the cost, e.g. I ordered the wok fried rice with tofu, but it didn't have any tofu in it.  What was very frustrating though was that we had informed the hotel at several points (before our stay, when we arrived via a form which asked for dietaries) that I was vegan, but no one seemed to care/remember.  At dinner for example I was repeatedly brought an amuse-bouche which I couldn't eat, and when I asked if it was vegan they would take it away- no alternative was offered. In the afternoon the staff would bring cookies to the room which was a lovely touch, but again they weren't vegan. For such a high-quality hotel, the staff should know if guests have dietary requirements. The Sri Lankan food in the restaurant was very good but some of the other dishes lacked flavour.
title: Wonderful hotel, but some improvements could be made.

text: This place is exceptional- we had a tent on the sea front with stunning views. The food was excellent and staff really helpful. Nifras was superb and attentive as our ‘butler’. Each tent has its own mobile phone to ask questions or order room service. The 30m infinity pool is clean and attractive. The beach is stunning and local fishermen fish daily.
title: Stunning location and superb hotel

placeInfo/address: Kimbula Thona Kalkudah Beach, Kiran 30000 Sri Lanka
text:
Nous avons dormi 4 nuits dans ce complexe hôtelier 
Situé au bout d une route qui mène sur une plage absolument paradisiaque lhotel se compose de tentes luxueuses 
La deco est élégante et la douche en plein air constitue une expérience sensorielle unique ! 
Le lieu est magnifique de jour comme de nuit lorsque plein de petites et grandes lumières tamisées rendent l endroit féerique 
La plage est calme mais personne ne s y baigne peut être à cause des méduses ? 
Vous pourrez assister au travail des pêcheurs qui partent le matin et rentrent le soir avec leur filet rempli de poissons 
La plage devant l hôtel est propre mais dès qu on s éloigne un peu malheureusement plastiques et bouteilles jonchent le sol
La piscine de l hôtel est splendide 
Le bémol du séjour réside dans la qualité de la nourriture : le matin le petit déjeuner est excellent et se compose de produits frais mais le soir nous avons été déçus tant par la qualité que par les prix pratiqués nettement trop chers 
Le personnel est attentif mais peu souriant. 
Le butler personnel est excellent, à vos moindres souhaits
title: Un bel hôtel isolé et reposant

text: This is a truly amazing place. Being the only hotel on a stunning 15 km golden palm-fringed beach with shallow waters, you would think you stranded on a desolate island. But if you turn the other way, you will see a spacious high-end and architecturally brilliant hotel. There is creative artwork scattered all over the property and the details in the rooms and outdoor areas are mind-blowing. The 30-meter infinity pool is simply amazing, the service is very professional, everything is spotlessly clean and the food is good (but not excellent). The outdoor shower in your own little lush courtyard will give you one of the best shower experiences you’ll ever have, in combination with the provided bath items and their unbelievably good fragrance. My highest recommendations for this hotel!
title: Absolutely amazing

placeInfo/address: Kimbula Thona Kalkudah Beach, Kiran 30000 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Profitez juste de your ce que ce petit paradis peut vous offrir. Le reste, c'est du détail 😉
text:
L'endroit est absolument féerique, très isolé ce qui en fait un petit paradis sur terre !
L'accueil est très agréable et chaleureux, tant de la part personnel que de celle de leur "pétillant" manager, "Umberto".
Les villas/tentes sont superbes, tout confort, literie très bonne, douche extérieure géniale, le tout très propre, même si un petit rafraîchissement déco pourrait être réalisé, mais c'est un détail ! (abat-jour assez taché, tableau au-dessus du lit décollé de son support...)
La piscine est superbe. Juste dommage qu'il n'y ait pas assez de chaises longues + parasols (indispensable !) autour de la piscine ! Ça fait un peu "la guerre des chaises longues" dès l'aube ! Vous voyez ce que je veux dire !?
Les massages sont exceptionnels et les masseuses ont des doigts de fée !
Les repas sont bons, mais pas tout-à-fait ce que nous attendions de ce niveau d'hôtel. Pas toujours très raffiné et beaucoup trop copieux ! Or, on déteste jeter de la nourriture !
Attendez-vous aussi à être réveillé assez tôt (vers 5h du matin ?). L'hôtel n'y peut rien bien sûr, mais c'est quand-même dérangeant. En effet, des chants hindoux, assez forts, provenant d'un temple tout près, vous réveillent dès 5.00' (ou même 4.45'?) + le passage du train vers 6.00,+ les aboiements de chiens... Pas toujours. très agréable si tôt le matin 🤪
Et attention, il faut savoir qu'aux prix indiqués (repas, boissons, massages,...) , il faut toujours ajouter 10% de service (normal) et 18% de taxes... Ça monte vite la note finale !

Y passer 3 jours est vraiment parfait
title: Un petit coin de Paris perdu au bout du monde, mais...

placeInfo/address: Kimbula Thona Kalkudah Beach, Kiran 30000 Sri Lanka
text:
Wow…wat een prachtig resort en wat een vriendelijke mensen en geweldige service!
We kregen een prachtige luxe tent/lodge voorzien van grote airco en fans. Koelkast, koffie en thee en onbeperkt drinkwater. Schitterende buitendouche en terras. Bed was ook heerlijk. Het zwembad met zicht op de zee en de lekkere bedjes zijn heerlijk. Het strand loop je zo op en ook hier genoeg plekjes om te zitten of liggen. Mooie beachbar met heerlijke lounge zitjes en een toprestaurant. Het ontbijt is van wereldklasse! Onbeperkt ala carte ontbijten met keuzes te over! Beste die ik ooit heb gehad. 
Het was onze huwelijksreis dus ons bed mooi versierd, vers fruit gekregen en ook nog eens een prachtig taartje😋 kortom: dit resort zorgt ervoor dat je niet naar de malediven hoeft👍 topplek!!
title: Beter wordt het niet!!

roomTip: Get a Palam tent on the beach.  It's wonderful to wake up to see the sunrise on the beach.
text:
Karpaha Sands is an absolutely wonderful boutique hotel that delivers on so many levels.  The safari-style tents with outdoor shower create a very stylish and romantic ambience, the restaurant and bar offer lots of choice and consistently high quality food and drink. The location, off the beaten track, is stunning and relaxing.  The public spaces are beautifully designed with attention to detail, I could go on and on.  Umberto, the general manager strives to deliver a very personalised service and talks to guests on a daily basis. He even offered our 9-year-old to accompany him into the kitchen and help cook his pasta! 

Both the Sri Lankan and Italian dishes offered in the restaurant were delicious and fairly prices, as were the drinks.  We booked half-board and were very pleased that we weren't limited to a small separate menu but could choose freely off the normal menu, which had lots of options and huge portion sizes.  

Ash, our butler looked after us extremely well. When he saw us up for sunrise on the beach he offered to bring us a cappuccino.  He surprised us with a wedding anniversary cake and when after our meal, we returned to our room we find our bed decorated with towel art and flowers.  He arranged our beach bbq dinner and acted as our personal server during the evening, even taking photos and videos for us!  He also organised our cinema under the stars and brought us popcorn, it was a wonderful way to while away the evening. Karpaha Sands is the kind of place that truly relaxes you and lets you forget all your stresses and strains.  Sadly I didn't get round to trying the ayurvedic spa treatments, which looks very inviting and again were very fairly prices. All in all we were very sad to leave and would have happily stayed longer.   We would throughougly recommend staying here if you're visiting this part of Sri Lanka.
title: Paradise on the East Coast

placeInfo/address: Kimbula Thona Kalkudah Beach, Kiran 30000 Sri Lanka
text:
Had a wonderful stay at Karpaha Sands from start to finish. The hotel is beautifully set on a quiet remote beach, safari style tent accommodation is comfortable and stylish, and the staff were all extremely attentive, friendly, and hospitable. Just like the pictures online, paradise on Sri Lanka’s East Coast. 

Our butler Banda went above and beyond to make us comfortable, and a special a shout out to Kumari for the wonderful three-day Ayurvedic spa treatments. Reasonably priced and highly recommended. 

Food was also excellent and aside from a couple of meals, we ate at the hotel restaurant for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Lots of options available, from local favourites, to Italian seafood dishes, to BBQ private dining experiences. 

Lastly, access really isn’t as bad as some other reviews make out. Yes, the 2km track off the main road is a little bumpy in places but our driver had no problems, and getting around the local area by TukTuk is easily arranged.
title: Paradise on Sri Lanka’s East Coast

Для нас было особенно важно, чтобы вы чувствовали себя как дома и наслаждались комфортом, чистотой и удобством нашего расположения. Ваши теплые слова о нашем сервисе вдохновляют нас продолжать делать все возможное для наших гостей.

С нетерпением ждем новых встреч с вами и вашей семьей в будущем!

С наилучшими пожеланиями,
placeInfo/address: 24/4 Welle Dewalaya Rd, Unawatuna 80600 Sri Lanka
text:
Прилетели 26.03.24 в аэропорт Матала около 14.00. Прошли паспортный контроль, поменяли валюту и вот мы уже в автобусе. Через 2 часа уже были в Унаватуне. С большого автобуса нас пересадили в маленькие грузовые машинки и довезли до отеля.

В отеле нас встретил управляющий с готовыми номерами, освежающими полотенцами и вкусным свежевыжатым соком.

Номер нам достался на 2 этаже. Номер большой, белоснежный с огромной кроватью. Белье, полотенца меняли кадые 3 дня, шампунь и гели пополняли каждый день. В номере был чайник и бокалы. Чай, кофе, сливки тоже докладывали каждый день.

2 бутылки воды были по приезду, а потом мы их пополняли в кулере на этаже. Также был сейф, сушилка для белья. Огромный балкон с соломкой от солнца.

Завтрак всегда один и тот же, но не надоел. Яйца в разных видах, горячие тосты, сосиски, кексы, йогурты, фрукты, свежевыжатый сок, чай или кофе, молоко, джемы и масло.

Отель чистый, ухоженный, персонал приветливый. Что понравилось, отель открывается через электронный ключ. Посторонние попасть не могут. А еще его расположение, в стороне от шумной дороги. Но при этом в шаговой доступности от пляжа, кафе, и вин.маркета)

Нам все понравилось. Отель рекомендуем для спокойного отдыха!!!
title: ПРЕКРАСНАЯ ШРИ ЛАНКА И ОТЛИЧНЫЙ ОТЕЛЬ
